title: Great hotel
review: Stayed here for a week such a friendly hotel, staff so happy 😁 & friendly always ready to help. Super food lots to choose from. The steak house 10euro is by the pool the best steak ever.  Myself & two girlfriends shared a room in block A as I had requested a ground floor room close to amenities due to mobility.. we had a private transfer from airport £16 each return great value . Hope to return next year

title: Wonderful holiday
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: A lovely hotel in a great setting.
review: Honestly can't fault this Hotel, really struggling to know what people have complained about, this was our 4th visit, food is great, the Restaurants are fab, we visited all 5 there is always freshly cooked food available from the numerous chef stations in the buffet, the staff are helpful, only one negative, all the pools were freezing! but the sea was warm Highly recommended

title: Rude staff
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Very relaxing
review: We stayed here the last two weeks in September. It is a beautifully hotel and with manicured gardens. The main pool is really nice with lots of loungers around and more in the gardens adjacent. There is a beach plus two piers all with more loungers   We were in a lovely room in the main building. Large bed, air conditioning and a flat screen tv. There is a mini bar restocked every day with branded soft drinks, beer and both still and sparkling water. The bathroom had a large walk in shower with plenty of hot water. The was a hairdryer, shaver point and shaving mirror.  Food and drink – good with lots of choice and always fresh. Lots of different places to get food and drink from with many cooking in front of you. There are speciality restaurants – Italian, Fish, Turkish, and Asian. There is also a Steak restaurant (at a supplement) which we really enjoyed as the food and setting was superb.  There were lots of staff who we always found to be friendly and helpful. There seemed to be lots of staff always cleaning and tidying the whole hotel. They seem to take pride in the hotel and we were asked many times how the holiday was going and was everything satisfactory.  The reception staff were particularly help when we discovered my wife had forgotten one of her medications. I spoke to reception who rang a pharmacy and organised for it to be delivered to the hotel that afternoon – great service.  Overall a great holiday and we intend to return.…

title: Wonderful holiday
review: We went on a TUI package, 2-9th Oct.  We were picked up by coach at the airport and transferred to our hotel.  Given a glass of Prosecco on arrival, some general info then shown to our rooms, there were four of us travelling together, despite our late arrival we were able to get a meal in the buffet restaurant.  We all were impressed by the cleanliness,facilities and helpfulness of staff.  There were no hidden extras, mini bar (non alcoholic), safe, spa, sauna, all food and drinks were all included at no extra charge.  Hot drinks, ice creams and patisseries were available all day. The sea was warm 26 degrees, but beware biting fish.  My sister was bitten on both legs, quite bad bites. Could not fault the hotel though and would visit again.

title: Fantastic Hotel - Didn't Disappoint
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Highly recommend
review: Just returned from our fourth visit to this lovely hotel and area. Stayed 01/10/19 - 08/10/19.  Booked a package with TUI, flights were on time both ways, private transfers were excellent and well worth the little extra money.  Arrived at the hotel to a lovely welcome with a glass of bubbly. Quick check in and shown to our room (1118, 2 bed family room in main building).  Food and drink - fantastic as always, lots of choice and always fresh. Lots of different places to get food and drink from. Staff and ambience - excellent, lovely people who can't do enough for you. Activities - there if you want them (for both adults and kids). Rooms - lovely and spacious, cleaned every day. Spa - my wife had a Hamam and massage and said it was amazing! On site photographer - got some great…

title: 5* not
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. Also we are thankful for Your comments. We will definitely share them with hotel management. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Lovely hotel
review: Stayed here mid September.  What a beautifully set out hotel and manicured gardens.  Our room , 3116b was Situated in the garden area and overlooked a pool.  Free minibar,  air conditioned, a short walk to the main hotel pool and building.  Food of a decent standard and plentiful.  40min walk along the waters edge brings you into Side center.  Shops accept Euro’s but it was more economical to pay in lira due to the exchange rate at the time. Ask the price in lira.  Staff friendly.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Enjoyable week
review: We had a deluxe room in the main building with a side sea view. I think this entitled us to have beer in our minibar as well as soft drinks And also dressing gowns and slippers. The minibar was replenished daily. The room was cleaned daily. The electronic safe was free. The air conditioner could have been a bit more powerful. The hotel and grounds were also kept to a high standard. There was always a large selection of different foods in the main buffet restaurant. There were also ‘cooking stations’ with different dishes for different meal times. The food in the Turkish a la carte was lovely but my favourite was the steak a la carte (additional charge of €10 per person) the food there was exceptional. We also tried the fish restaurant and the Asian which was my least favourite. …

title: Good hotel
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Very calm nice relaxing place near ancient Side
review: A very nice well organised hotel. It has more good points than bad and most reviews are correct. We enjoyed our stay here, it’s one of the best we have stayed in. Food is good considering the amount of guests they cater for. This is a very busy hotel. Drinks are ok, EFES beer. Not sure if the spirits are top brands and the wine is excellent. We thought the bar staff a bit rude and would serve others nationality’s first and ignore women in favour of men. The  staff in the lobby bar are lovely and good fun. Always kept your drinks topped up. Rooms cleaning isn’t great. Only changed the beds once. In all though we enjoyed it here and yes we would come back.

title: Nice relaxing break
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. Also we are thankful for Your comments. We will definitely share them with hotel management. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Tui and turquoise holiday not worth dealing with either
review: Don´t expect 5 but 4 star hotel and you´ll be really satisfied.  Pros:  - excellent location (the ancient Side 40 mins beach walk, Appollo Temple is visible from a pier). You easily get to Manavgat and Side by bus (stops right in front of the hotel entrance, busses go very often, even in the evening). - the hotel is quite, we had the greatest sleep ever, as we stayed in standard room in a garden, even the pool area was much more quiet than experienced in other hotels - guests consisted of German, some Dutch, British, a little Czech and Polish, some Scandinavians - this all is like 95 %. Everyone knows what I mean,who was missing and why it´s in pros :-) - the staff was extremely nice - big variety of food and drinks, 24 hrs availability.  - plenty of sunbeds - there were always…

title: Relax and fun..
review: Great balance between relax and fun. The villa concept gives you the sense of privacy - private pool, dedicated restaurant for the guests of the villas makes you feel like in a small hotel. On the main pool activities for everyone. Green and lush grounds. Pebbles on the beach mixed with sand, but you can swim from the piers. For fishermen, spot from where you can enjoy your hobby.

title: Amazing family holiday
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Just beautiful
review: We have just had an amazing 2 weeks at the Turquioze hotel. We had an initial incident with our pushchair being broken in transit to Turkey. The TUI reps at the hotel were amazing and got us a replacment pushchair the same day we couldn't have survived 2 weeks with a 1 year old without out this. The hotel itself is beautiful and so well maintained.  Even though it was full to capacity it has a relaxing atmosphere plenty of space / lots of sun loungers etc.   Pool areas / gardens / beach and piers are fantastic. Really impressed with the food the best all inclusive food we have had and also plenty of à la cartes to choose from to break it up a bit (not able to go to the Italian with children under 12 though which was very disappointing) Drinks were good quality entertainment and…

title: Nice Hotel
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. Also we are thankful for Your comments. We will definitely share them with hotel management. But it would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Amazing hotel
review: I would highly recommend this hotel. The staff are amazing. The gardens and grounds are stunning. The food is good and caters for all tastes. We were upgraded to a villa which was in such a beautiful setting. If had to make a constructive criticism it would be that our aircon unit  was a bit noisy at times and room was very clean ,but a bit tired in places. But nothing that put me off staying in the room. Thank you torquoise hotel for a lovely holiday. Xxx

title: Almost 5 star
review: Just returned from turquoise hotel and few small things that doesn’t make this hotel 5 *,arrived to find that rooms we booked and payed for where not available .so was given a family room  for four adults in there 60s which was unsuitable .we did get the rooms we payed  for next day but not until 3pm , the rooms we had was in need of a Refurb but  comfortable and clean , apart from that the hotel is really great , food lovely and loads to choose from al la carts also good , staff very friendly and helpful, entertainment very good , drinks nice and strong tasty cocktails lots of bars ,pools clean Loads of sun beds , beach nice but quite a lot of stones in the water , two nice piers for sunbathing ,

title: Lovely Hotel
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. Also we are thankful for Your comments. We will definitely share them with hotel management. But it would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Great time
review: This was our first time at Turquoise Hotel and Side town, we have stayed in a few places in Turkey throughout the years and this did not disappoint. We arrived after a 2 hour delay from Manchester at around 17.30, check in was really quick and well organised, we gave our passports in and was asked to sit at a big table, so there was no waiting one by one checking in, reception then came over to us all with our key cards, towel cards and check in forms, then we were given a talk about information regarding our stay. We then had a complimentary drink and given a ride to our apartment via a golf buggy. We stayed in G block which is furthest away near the top entrance, we had been given a family 2 bedroom apartment even though there was only 2 of us so we had loads of storage space…

title: Top Class
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Sat on balcony on our last day writing this.the hotel is lovely from the moment we arrived at 5am champagne and cold flannels waiting. Reception was lovely  Hotel is clean and food is good the al a cart restaurant were all good a pain to book but nice change from buffet.  Relaxing is lovely and quite could do with a fridge to keep drinks in as its away from bars .beach is ok but stoney but nice breeze.  All the staff work so hard but in the buffet in the evening always greeted us with a smile and great service. The sunset bar was nice for a drink after dinner and great service to. Now the main sultan bar is hope that's right he was amazing remembered are drinks always busy but very personal service and Kader her smile and dancing well keep you happy. We had a great time and…

title: Great holiday
review: Antalya airport was a nightmare (nearly 2 hours waiting for our luggage) so glad we had booked a private transfer. Lovely welcome in the early hours at the hotel, lovely glass of bubbly, quick check in and took to room (block G 7130). We then went for a quick snack, restaurant open all night.  The room was well maintained and spacious with lovely views over the gardens and very quiet. The grounds are really well kept, we spent most days at the adults only pool or in the over 16's part of the beach, there was always ample sun loungers, in and out of the shade, no need to do a dawn run with your towel!! We visited all the a-la-carte restaurants and found them all great, thanks to the fish restaurant for supplying non fish food for our daughter. The main restaurant always had…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Lovely hotel!
review: Hotel was stunning, greeted on arrival at 4.30am with an ice cold flannel and a glass of bubbly!  Room was lovely, grounds well looked after, staff very friendly and food was fabulous(although you do get a bit fed up of it after a while).  We ate in 2 a la carte restaurants, fish one and steak (cost 10 euros but worth it).  Foam party on a Friday which was fun, also the pier used for sunbathing during the day turned into a venue with DJ's to dance on a few times a night.  Adults only pool wasn't monitored and had a couple of young children there, parents didn't seem to care!  Entertainment was good in the evening, all in all a fab hotel.

title: Relaxing
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Lovely stay
review: Stayed at the Turquoise hotel for two weeks with my 5 year old son and parents. Beautiful hotel and stunning grounds. Hotel was well maintained and cleaned in communal areas. Found cleaning in the rooms not up to a great standard, floors were always very dirty. Mini bar was filled everyday. Food was plentiful and we never had any issue with finding something lovely to eat, my son only really ate chips and garlic bread at night as the same meals at the children’s buffet, more choice would be better here. Had a sea view room at the start of the holiday but the noise from the evening entertainment was terrible, so had to move part way, reception were very good at finding another room the same day and was a hassle free move. Beach lovely, but you do need shoes to enter the sea from…

title: 4* hotel 3*staff
review: We stayed here in August for 1 week, hotel is nice with lovely grounds, good pools and drinks, food is the same each day more variety needed, the entertainment is very much aimed for the Russians, the things that really let this hotel down is firstly there are cats everywhere, I do not mind cats but not in inside the dining areas! think there is an hygiene issue here! 2nd the bar staff are very rude, they will always serve their favourites first, waiters are very unhelpful and also have their favourites, IE Turkish and the Russians! the rest they have no time for! cleaners missed cleaning our room twice and bed sheets never changed! All in all it was a disappointing holiday as we was expecting 4*plus but instead got 3* This is a nice hotel let down by the staff and mangers using…

title: Good holiday, not five star accommodation.
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. Also we are thankful for Your comments. However, we are sad that this vacation did not meet Your expectations. We will definitely share Your comments with hotel management.

title: Great hotel
review: I very recently stayed at this hotel with my husband and our two children.   The hotel is large, rooms are split over a number of different buildings across site.  We stayed in the main building in a ground floor room near to the lobby.  Our room was tired, not worthy of 5 stars.  It was adequate however was not cleaned once during our two week stay.  Bedding was not changed either however clean towels were provided every day and the mini bar replenished (soft drinks and water).   The facilities were good.  We spent most of our time at the Splash Pool where the children loved the three water slides, lots of fun however be warned they are not open all day.  Lifeguard on duty although on one occasion the life guard thought it would be more fun to remove his shirt and whistle and…

title: Very enjoyable stay
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. Also we are thankful for Your comments. However, we are sad that this vacation did not meet Your expectations. We will definitely share Your comments with hotel management.

title: Good hotel
review: We visited as a family of 7 with varying ages and found this hotel had something for each of us.  The food was very good and always had variety. The 5 a la Carte restaurants were definitely worth visiting. Had to book a day in advance but this was not a problem.  The staff were friendly and helpful. The best welcome at reception we have ever received as you sit down in comfort with a drink and the staff come to you.  Plenty of sun loungers and not squashed together. The pool is large and warm so spent loads of time in there to cool down.  Found that euros is the easiest currency to use so don’t bother with Liras. Side town centre is only a 10 minute taxi (€8 for 7 people) or a 40 minute beach walk away.   The resort is very large and we were given 3 rooms together, so this was…

title: Hotel that should be *** stars
review: We have been to this hotel already in July 2018. without a baby. We recomended this hotel several times because we had a good time.This year we went with our baby. We will never recommend this hotel again.  There were good sides to this hotel so let me start with the positive: The beach always has free sunbathing beds so there is space and you can choose. There are beach bars with drinks and coffee throughout the day. There are a few people from the staff that are actually nice and the evening programme is not that bed. City centre is close and cheap to get to by dolmos (1euro per person) Now the negative: First situation: We get a pamflet where it says at what time is each meal and we get down around 18:55 at the main restaurant (pamflet says dinner 18:45) so we say super we…

title: All inclusive
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. Also we are thankful for Your comments. However, we are sad that this vacation did not meet Your expectations. We will definitely share Your comments with hotel management.

title: Excellent, friendly team
review: Just checked out at the hotel Turquoise and got mixed feelings about the place. We've stayed here for 2 weeks as a couple and really glad we didn't bring children as there's not a lot to do. The entertainment team are very basic with the same activities daily to the same sound track twice a day in the pool area. It becomes very repetitive very quickly. The entertainment at night isn't very good and it gets very busy so can be difficult to get served with a drink. The food was ok for the first few days and again became very repetitive. It's pretty much the same thing for lunch and dinner everyday!! The room was lovely on first appearance but we soon realised it doesn't get cleaned properly. We had the same bits on the floor for the 2 full weeks and the balcony was filthy. That…

title: Friends week away
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. Also we are thankful for Your comments. However, we are sad that this vacation did not meet Your expectations. We will definitely share Your comments with hotel management.

title: Lovely but the beach is......
review: So this is the nicest hotel I’ve stayed in in Turkey so far.  Excellent service from friendly, attentive team members in all departments.  Few suggestions for improvement.   1.  Quality of towels in room and pool towels are poor, worth bringing your own pool towels with you. 2.  No sanitiser / hand gel available in restaurants which I would have expected, so again bring some with you if this is important to you.  3. Lack of late checkout rooms.  If you can get it it’s basically 10 euro an hour to keep your room on.  Even though I would have paid the extra, I couldn’t keep my room fir more than 3 hrs which wasn’t worth it as my flight wasn’t going for another 8 hours after that.  The shared changing facilities in the spa provided are wholly inadequate.  I don’t expect to be in a…

title: Summer holiday
review: Very nice and pleasant hotel. Good food and everybody will find something delicious to eat. Very big pool and smaller with aqua park. I recommend to take a walk   from Side to the hotel along the beach 30-40 minutes!!

title: Looks good on the pictures, even better when you get there
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Turquoise is a great hotel but don't play bingo...
review: Everything was great... the pools, the food, the private beach, the entertainment, the staff. The complex is very big and you get that feeling of exploring over the first few days. One small pleasant thing is that there were almost no flies, wasps, bees, mosquitos on our stay. Some resorts its impossible to even relax by the pool without being disturbed by the little creatures but here it is (dare i say) perfect. All the rooms are good, don't worry about upgrading. Side is very close by and great to look around, lots & lots of cheaper priced shops, eat, drink, and see the sunset whilst having dinner. We went to Karma restaurant which was reasonably priced. Recommend at least 2 visits to Side! Manavgat is also close by, there is a huge market on thursdays, go and explore that,…

title: Amazing Holiday!
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Debi
review: We stayed at the hotel in July 19 for 10 days, everything was great, food very good, it did get crowded towards the end of our stay. Side is an interesting and historic place and great to visit if Roman ruins interest you, plus shopping was excellent for "Turkish Originals".  We played and won prizes at bingo one evening after paying 10 Euros for a card and were given free vouchers for on-site services one of which was a free photo from the on-site photography team. We had had several pictures taken so thought we would just pick a couple pay for one and get one free. The head of the photography service would not honour the prize saying that we would need to book a whole session where he would no doubt try and persuade us to buy several pictures which we didnt want. He was very…

title: Second Visit
review: This was our second holiday at this lovely hotel, and we were not disappointed. It was just as nice as we remembered it from 5 years ago. It is spotlessy clean, and all the staff are helpful and friendly. I must mention our waiter Tugut in the fish al a carte restaurant who was so efficient and lovely and friendly. Could,nt believe he remembered us from our previous visit. The food was excellent in the al a carte restaurants. It was nice to have waiter service, after the main buffet restaurant. The waitress we had each lunchtime Medine, really looked after us, and always remembered what we liked to drink. We had a standard garden room which was really nice, and on the first floor, overlooking the beautiful gardens. Such a lovely setting, and really quiet. We spoke to people who…

title: Family Holiday
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Great time
review: We were looking for a 2 week holiday that offered all inclusive with more than just a buffet restaurant. This place offered a few different restaurants but the options were limited.  We arrived around 1am and after a cold drink and quick check in we were shown to the room. Transfer from the airport was about 75 mins but people have said can take longer depending on the amount of hotel stops on route. The general cleaning of the room needs improvement. The coffee cups and tray were left for 2 days without being cleaned. Plus the toilet roll wasn't replenished for 2 days and we had to call reception to bring more. The balcony wasn't cleaned during our entire stay.  There is a safe in the room. The room looked a bit tired and could do with a lick of paint.   The buffet does get a…

title: Holiday Retreat
review: My wife and I went here for 10 days at the beginning of July, we had a great time from arrival drinks to check out time, the rooms are spacious clean tidy well equipped and kept in tip top condition we were in block H 6021. The girls in the lobby bar were the best in really sorry that I can’t be sure of their names, they had drinks ready for us as soon as we entered the lobby, a real asset to this hotel, which I must say has lovely gardens pools and a nice beach. The entertainment team seemed to be more interested in Dutch, danish and Russian guests but wasn’t really a problem to us as we just wanted to relax,. Now the two downsides, the food was awful, and being a Head Chef of a large hotel I feel I’m qualified enough to pick holes, donor kebabs every day lunch and dinner is…

title: 4th time at this great hotel
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Fabulous!
review: Cannot say enough good things about this gorgeous hotel. Have stayed in many places but this is the best run I have ever been in. It is set in a beautiful location, built around established trees and to sit on the balcony of one of the garden rooms is just so relaxing. The staff are fantastic, none of the 'maybe tomoro' attitude that is common in the Med-  just one tip, take a book or something to 'mark' your restaurant table in case you have to leave it unattended or you will return to find it cleared cos the waiters are so fast! The food is great, especially the outside kitchens and the desserts, with lots of choice. The patisserie is fabulous too and they do ice cream all day. Rooms are clean and beds large and comfy and altho you can hear the entertainment from some garden…

title: Coming back again after a wonderful holiday
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Best holiday we've had.
review: We stayed at the Turquoise in May/June this year. What a wonderful hotel, it is so lovely to see so many smiley members of staff, nothing was a problem. We loved it so much we have booked to come back again in September to celebrate our anniversary. The main restaurant was excellent, enough choices to please everyone. From the first day we felt totally relaxed. This is from someone who does not normally return to the same place. Just can't wait to go back.

title: Recent Visit
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for Your stay. We are very glad to hear You enjoyed Your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have You back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Pleasant holidays
review: Stayed at this fantastic hotel from 6th of June for two weeks.  We were a bit worried about returning to Turkey after having the worst holiday we've had there but we are sooooo glad we did.  This hotel is easily the best we've ever stayed at and we're seasoned travellers. Everything about it is first class. Having said that, I agree with other reviewers about the unavailability of late check out. We were lucky enough to be offered the use of friends we'd met there's room to shower and change in as we were not being picked up until nine at night. Right back to the good stuff. EVERYTHING just EVERYTHING. Pool , room, food, entertainment but especially the staff. Isa the barman and Hamet the waiter (the hardest working man I've ever met) at the Sultan bar are a credit to this…

title: Great Hotel and Great Location
review: Had a week holiday at Turquoise Hotel in June as a couple and first time in Turkey. The hotel was great and in a fantastic location, with the hotel having a private beach and 2 piers either side. We arrived in the early hours and checked in quickly, with a friendly member of the reception team running through bits of the hotel with us and around 8 others arriving at a similar time.  The pool was huge and always had people using it, although as it was so big never felt crowded. The animation team do water gym, water polo and other activities in areas of the pool (sometimes don't take no for an answer when they promote around sunbeds!). However they do a big foam party in the pool on a Friday afternoon which was brilliant and people not in the pool were filming it around the…

title: Fabulous hotel
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Lovely relaxing hotel
review: Just back from 2 weeks holiday at turquoise hotel, this hotel is fantastic, the cleaners do a fantastic job, the food is a taste sensation, the rooms are spacious, the bar staff are always happy lovely lads, everything about it is great. Ali Mike and Melissa do a fantastic job with all day long entertainment, Sarah-Jane is guest liaison and she so helpful and friendly, we a family of 8 truly had a fantastic holiday thank you so very much to all of you. Would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely return x

title: Not quite 5 stars
review: We were allocated a lakehouse room on arrival. It was really lovely with its own pool. All the staff have been friendly,  professional and helpful.  Facilities are excellent and the food is good and plenty of it. We came for a relaxing break and have got exactly that. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Great hotel, not sure about the area
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Almost five stars,
review: Our third time in Side, an Turquoise is absolutely the best hotel we have had there. Location was perfect for us: a little bit outside the city centrum, green and quiet. There were huge trees, grass areas and beautiful flowers. Whole area was spotless.   We had a family room with two bedrooms, kids had also normal beds. Beds were a little hard, exactly how we like, usually beds tend to be too soft. Room was clean but needs some renovation. When taking a shower you had to stand in a bath tub. It was very slippery when wet, so you had to be very careful especially when climbing off.  Food was just great. If you can't find anything to eat it's not hotel's fault. In buffet restaurant there were many kinds of salads, fresh and cooked vegetables, fruits, cheese, grilled food from…

title: Weeks holiday
review: Nice clean hotel.  All inclusive but only Turkish food went out to eat a couple of times ...would of been nice if they catered for all. Had to get bus to  town.   bus stopped right outside .shops in hotel grounds very expensive.   Best to avoid.  All prices in Euro’s they don’t like English money.

title: Nice hotel could do with a few tweaks
review: Myself and a friend booked this through TUI, we arrived quite late in the evening and we were welcomed with a glass of champagne and a lovely French receptionist ran through everything and we were taken to our room by a very pleasant bell boy. The room, the hotel and its grounds are very well kept. The pool area, bars and restaurants are all very clean and tidy. The room was spacious with a good bathroom, plenty of towels, toiletries and a robe each.  As we arrived late we could go to the buffet and have a small buffet, which was good...breads, cheese, a couple of hot dishes, salad and puddings. In general, the food is of good quality but is more catered to Western European tastes. There’s a good selection of salads etc at the inside buffet. Personally, I didn’t eat any of the…

title: Best Hotel on Price and Quality in 2019
review: Hello,  Just back from this Hotel of a Holiday of 14 days... Our 10th time to Turkey brought us this Pearl in Side... This longer existing Hotel is back on track to be the best Beach Hotel of Side... on qualities we all want on Holiday times,... The first thing when we arrived was the open real friendly service of all personal.. We had a lake-house type II with bath below, and had the experience with a own pool for the houses and waiters. Safe in the house and towel service two times a day, and free drink-service in mini bar.. also television HD flatscreen with 116 channels, also Euroports 1 and 2... Also the near Bougainville restaurant is only for lake-house owners, so you can eat your mails free from super breakfast/lunch ( a la carte/dinner ( a la carte) but you can also eat…

title: 7 days in May
review: On behalf of Turquoise Hotel family, we would like to express our sincere gratitude for choosing our property for your stay. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. It would be an honour to have you back in Turquoise Hotel.

title: Great Holiday
review: Lovely rooms, tea and coffee included but no milk for tea.  service excellent, food could have been hotter, some strange dishes sautéed potatoes and brussels for breakfast. Really good selection of Danish pastries, cheeses and cold meats, healthy eaters catered .

title: Decent stay
review: The hotel is decent and the rooms are very comfortable. The food isn't amazing but it's better than alot i've experienced in Turkey. The staff are very friendly. We spent most of our time on the beach which is great except you'll need to find the little gap in the pebbles that hide just out in the sea. Also, be careful a little bit further out in the sea as there are some pretty big rocks just under the water's surface. On the whole this hotel was worth the money and i'd happily go back there

title: Recommended
review: An impressive hotel, clean, friendly staff but the food wasn’t fantastic but that you have with big kitchens. I would recommend this hotel for everybody who wants to relax on the beach or one of the many pools

title: Excellent stay!
review: Myself and my husband stayed at this hotel for 7 nights! best experience ever, the staff was very accommodating and helpful, the room was very good including the bathroom, depending on the rooms, some of the view is limited to the outdoor gardens. The buffet restaurant is ideal for brunch and easy going with the queues and options to choose from, our favourite restaurant would be Chinese and Italian. The entertainment is amazing, ideal for couples and families, they include everyone to join and have fun! Engin is the best bartender! if you need to find him go to sultan bar!!!, definitely had a good time with him and experimenting various cocktails.  Swimming pools were always warm, clean and never full of people so it was nice to have quiet moments to just relax.

title: Fifth time worst time
review: Arrived at turquoise early hours july 5th so 1st night gone. Given what must have been the smallest room in the hotel with mould on the walls and a damp musky smell that looked out onto the wall of the building opposite definetely not a deluxe room when we complained was told room would be changed in the morning  loss of another day given a room above reception after being told we would get a seaview room  as requested previously so we could hear coaches and taxis and guests coming and going through the night . found veronica guest relations (ex animation) very rude at times not helpful at all her favourite phrase was perhaps you did not understand I did not find the reception staff very helpful at all this time round. the entertainment was very samey the food had gone downhill…

title: Back again!!!!
review: Well we went back to the Turquoise Hotel for our second visit and for a two week stay this time!! Although our trip was in October (12 - 27th) the weather was fantastic although we had 2 days of wind and rain! But hey, there was plenty of food, beer and things to pass the time until the weather subsided. We did nothing except relax for 2 weeks AND not once did we feel bored. I even managed to finish 2 books that have travelled the world (not entirely accurate) for the past 5 years. I can`t say anymore other than we will pop back in 2019 for a week before another 2 weeker in 2020.....

title: Excellent Hotel
review: This hotel was amazing. From the moment we arrived (2hrs late as flight was delayed!), the staff were so helpful and friendly, we had champagne on arrival & late buffet. The room was lovely, clean and had tea/coffee making facilities as well as a mini fridge that was free & restocked daily. Everywhere was clean & tidy and well looked after. We did the Hamman spa on our first day which I would definitely recommend. The food was really nice, fresh and had a nice amount of variety. Would certainly go back here.

title: Holiday 2018
review: A lovely, clean and very friendly hotel. We had a lovely room. The main restaurant had an amazing variety of food available catering for all tastes. The a La carte Fish Restaurant was excellent as was the Turkish restaurant.  The pool was clean, the grounds and the beach were  spotless.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  There are a number of cats in the grounds and even they are treated like VIPs! They are regularly checked over by a vet and are well fed over in the Cat House! There are great facilities for children too making it a family friendly hotel. There are wonderful snack bars open all day too, so you'll never go hungry  😊 There are also amazing archaeological sites that are must to visit.....quite unbelievable! Overall, an excellent experience and a very…

title: Quick week away
review: We booked a last minute trip to this hotel to join friends who had already booked. We were so lucky as we checked in we found our we were in a villa which has its own pool. Access to the French restaurant for breakfast and lunch and free booking in the evenings. Food within the hotel was amazing. We loved the snack bar for lunch. We would return to this hotel. Spa was great and we would recommend having a hammam at the start of your holiday I ended up with the best suntan I have ever had and my skin felt amazing.

title: Surely amazing experiance!
review: We've stayed in Turrquase in the end of October as a family of 4 adults and 2 kids(12 and 1,5 years old). Everyone were sad to leave- we enjoyed every single day of vacation.   Food.  10 out of 10.  Kitchen team is doing miraculous job. We are going to Turkish hotels for a 11 years and it was best food we had so far. Even in the end of the season choise was increadible and every time in a main restaurant we were met with warm attention of the staff. Our 1 year old has food allergies. And even though we didn't inform about it in advance we were immidiattalelly suggested with special menu. we were truly touched.   Staff. 10 out of 10.  big thanks for everyone from  cleaning staff, technitions, bar tenders, waitresses to management. We were met with smile and kindness in every…

title: Great holiday reasonably priced
review: Just spent two weeks at the fully inclusive Turquoise hotel Side, Turkey.I had never been to Turkey before, but have come back having had an extremely enjoyable two weeks. The staff were really friendly, service was really good and the food was excellent , we had two nights at the Turkish restaurant and the Fish restaurant,   and the rest of the time in the general one, but cannot fault any, you would never come away hungry, so much choice. Although we didn't go to much of the included entertainment those that did seemed to enjoy it. All the staff seem to work tirelessly to make your holiday an enjoyable one, plus if you like historical sites there is plenty to see, plus the market for something a little bit more low key. Thank you Turquoise for a great two weeks

title: birthday treat for my wife
review: this is my first stay at this hotel and it will be my last you see i am a vegetarian and they did not have any for vegetarian even when we ask them to cook something for us they put meat ball in the curry it is a great hotel don't get me wrong close to the beach and the setting quaint and peaceful you can travel on the local transport even the tui staff did not know anything

title: Green and calm
review: The most I liked was the location of the hotel, the tranquility, the kindness of the employees and the fact that they are cats friendly. We stayed in a standard room, block A. Room was ok. Just the bathroom seemd to me small. Everything clean. The garden is very well maintained. Seems exotic. Great food. Dinner is themed (assian, mexican, fish, internationa, turkish, 1001 nights). Loved the cake shop. Many tasty cakes, baklava, turkish delight, ice cream. The beach is sandy with gravels and the entrance in the sea has some stones. But the hotel has 2 piers, one of the piers is long in the sea, so you can jump and swim there without touching stones. The water is clear, many fishes. If you walk on the beach in 40-50 min you can reach the ancient center of Side. I enjoyed…

title: Family Holiday
review: Just returned from a fantastic hotel, the hotel Is set in a beautiful surrounding. It’s clean and the tidy. Plenty of food and a great selection of drinks. Food was very good and a decent variety with theme evenings. Evening entertainment was good and bad, some evenings nothing but the nights there was shows they were good.  The staff were friendly but unfortunately didn’t speak much English. Favourite members of staff was the entertainment staff lend by Stafa. The whole family had a relaxing and enjoyable 2 weeks. Would return again.

title: Fantastic Hotel - great memories made!
review: This was mine and my wife's third stay at this hotel (previous 2014 and 2015) and I must say it has got even better! My parents also accompanied us on this trip, their first time to Turkey.  Travelled 5th-12th October. Booked a package with TUI, outbound flight and transfer to hotel great (we dropped off at three hotels before ours so total time was about 1hr 15mins). Arrived at hotel in the early hours, quick intro and room/towel cards given out, then some food - cold meats, breads, cereals at that time of day/night. Had a lovely two bedroom suite in the main building, not noisy at all which was a concern of mine as we were close to the lift and have two young children who are light sleepers. My parents room was also in the main building and very spacious. Cleaned and fresh…

title: Very relaxing hotel.
review: Have just returned from our first visit to the Turquoise hotel. We found the hotel to be far beyond our expectations after reading some very misleading reviews!! The hotel is really lovely in the middle of such a lovely natural environment & trees. The hotel facilities are as described, the service given by the very dedicated staff is applaudable. My husband & I found the whole atmosphere totally relaxing & look forward to our return visit next year.

title: Great hotel
review: Fantastic hotel. Lovely, clean and well looked after.  Great selection of drinks.  Great selection of food.  Plenty of places to relax and plenty for kids to enjoy too.  Only downside was the evening entertainment wasn’t up to the star rating of the hotel.

title: First family holiday
review: This was our first family holiday abroad with our toddler and although the hotel was good wouldn't rate it as a 5 star 3/4 star is more realistic. Rooms cleaned daily, mini bar and tea and coffee filled daily. Swimming pools are good sizes but not heated so took a lot to get in and couldn't stay in too long as my daughter would be shivering. Food was good and a decent variety however it doesn't really change even on the themed nights so after 2 weeks I won't be wanting a kebab or salad anytime soon lol. We tried the kebab steak fish chinese and Italian restaurants which were all good if you don't expect it to be completely authentic.  Ice cream was really nice with good selection of flavours. Gym wasn't cleaned the whole time, equipment was rusty and bench broken. Spa and Hamam…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Well what can I say, what a lovely hotel everything spotless from the rooms to the bars and restaurants. Room was very spacious and the bathroom had a large walk in shower all very clean. Full mini bar replenished daily with Coke fanta water and beer and plenty of tea and coffee. Toiletries provided shower gel shampoo conditioner, and body lotion. Food  and drink 24 hours a day which was very good. We ate in the fish and Italian restaurant which were very good especially the Italian. The whole hotel is full of friendly and helpful staff. The gardens and the pools are all well kept and looked after. Thank you to all the hard working staff. We shall be returning and we met some lovely people (JEAN& BOB) friends for life hope to see you soon.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: 50 year old UK couple, Turkish all inclusive for the first time. The hotel itself is well looked after and pretty modern. The staff are great and the food and drink to a good standard with plenty of variety. Facilities are great and location beautiful. A great all round visit for us and would recommend to anyone.

title: Very Disappointed
review: Just come back after a two weeks holiday, not a gr8t start after yet another delay from T.U.I over an hour late so it was after 2 am when we got to the hotel then to find out we was not booked into the  hotel which we had payed extra for, when we side to the man on the about this he said we was booked into the lake side villa's and would have to come back in the morning. Went back in the morning to see about getting into the hotel only to find out the man on the desk said  they only had one room left so we went and had a look at the room we had paid for a deluxe room high floor and this room was on the fist floor and it was a standard room very dark and a tree start out side the window, went back and said  this was not what we had payed for even showed him the paper work only to…

title: Annual holiday
review: We’ve just spent 9 glorious days here for the second year in a row. The hotel is lovely, the grounds are green and well cared for. The all inclusive food is excellent. There is always plenty of choice. The staff could not be friendlier. If I must be critical about anything then please don’t put a plastic straw in every drink, if someone wants one I’m sure they’ll ask. I appreciate that the pool areas need tidying but, if like us you want to sleep with the window open, 4am isn’t the time for loungers to be pulled around making noise. Other than that it’s a fantastic place for a great holiday. See you next year.

title: Nice Hotel needs a little tweeking
review: In September I stayed in the hotel with my wife and grandson had a familly room. The room was suitable for its purpose and always kept nice and clean by the maid. There was never any problem getting a sun bed no matter what time you get to the pool areas. The hotel was very clean in all areas and 95% of the staff were very friendly and helpfull especially the bar staff. The hotel has a large lobby  bar area but no atmosphere at all in other hotels that I have been to the lobby bar at night was the place to go but not here. The sofas are so large your feet dont touch the ground if you rest against the back. I personally did not rate the Al A Carte resturants chinese poor,Turkish poor and cold also went to the Italian which turned out to be the best of the 3, I didnt even try the…

title: Fantastic hotel, great holiday!
review: I would recommend this hotel to everyone! Overall a lovely clean modern hotel with friendly staff, a wide variety of tasty food. The room was superb, kept very clean by the cleaning staff. All in all a fantastic stay and I would not hesitate to visit this hotel again. Thanks for a great week!

title: Beautiful location with stunning rooms
review: We have just returned from a week at the Turquoise Hotel where we were very lucky to receive an upgrade to the beautiful lakeside villas.  It made for a wonderful holiday.  The grounds were immaculate and the view from the jetty just stunning.  Housekeeping was efficient and flexible (our teenage son often didn't emerge from his room until 2pm!).  The food could have been better - you had to time the buffet just right to get the freshly cooked meat.  The salad bar was good but overall the food was very repetitive and, frankly, not that well cooked.  We tried the Italian and the Chinese restaurants and they were both worse than the buffet, so we stuck with that. Entertainment was amateurish but well-intentioned. We went for a relaxing break and given that we had the use of the…

title: Holiday time
review: Had a lovely week away at this beautiful resort  Fantastic food and drink  Pool was lovely daytime entertainment good Evening entertainment was quite poor and aimed mainly for German clientele  The main problem for myself was the lack of information when our flight was delayed no information Tui rep unavailable (didn’t see much of him all week as was never there when we went to find him) the information that was there was taken away by staff then denied that there was any change of flight only when arguing with them and showing them our phones as we took photos for evidence they admitted the flight was going to be delayed If you don’t have any hiccups your stay will be fine but don’t ask for anything extra or out of the ordinary as they then can’t speak English apart from that a…

title: Over the top resort
review: The location is without doubt magnificent, nice garden, big trees and quiet. The latter only at the front side of the main building. The a la carte restaurants, Chines, Turkish,  Italian and fish are from very poor to fine, in this order. The rooms need a fresh paint to hide the dark brown, old fashioned paint now. The swimming pools with good towels surface have nice, clear water and are surrounded by nice grass. Pity that the whole day there is loud music. The beach is narrow with many stones in front of the resort, sand is to the left and to the right. Every evening there is entertainment from mediocre to okay. Music at the one large terrace and performances in the open air theatre. The dress code, mentioned at the entrance  at the restaurants are not enforced, neither the…

title: First time in Turkey
review: Me and my girlfriend stayed at the hotel for one week and were not disappointed, the hotel itself is a large complex with plenty of space. If you want to get away from the main pool which constantly plays music for some quiet and space there’s a 16+ beach which is fairly silent. Sun beds all around the front of the hotel on grassy areas and along the beach.   The food was amazing plenty to choose from, it does get a little repetitive but mainly because I’m a fussy eater. They have cold fruit and veg in a large dining room and plenty of meats in the outside dining area. The drinks were great, cocktails had a strong taste of vodka too them but we stuck mostly to soft drinks and beer.   The room was your average room, we had problems with the shower with it first not working and…

title: First class in everything. Cannot go wrong in this one.
review: As shown in the brochures. The hotel and grounds are vast plenty of secluded quiet places for you to park yourselves down on a sun bed they are plentiful and all over the complex.  The food in the main restaurant is very good with a wide range to suit all tastes. We visited the Italian, the steak and Chinese restaurants all are pretty good considering that they are free of charge apart from the steak house of €10 per person extra but it is well worth it. The staff in the hotel are all pleasant and have a 😁 on their faces. Unfortunately on this holiday I was bitten on the ankle which swelled up rather hastily the hotel doctor was on hand on examination cellulite was diagnosed. Hotel hospital ambulance took me to hospital, gave me a blood test, ultra sound on the whole of the leg…

title: Excellent hotel
review: Very good hotel with appartements/familyrooms. At the separate buildings are swimmingpools. And between  the mainbuilding and the sea (50mtr) there’s the big pool. Many possibilities for activities. Several very good restaurants besides the buffetrestaurant. Enormous choice in food of good quality.  You won’t be sorry for going here.

title: 15th Visit
review: Just returned from our 15th visit to this hotel and can honestly say the level of service just gets better. We were a little disappointed with the food last year but were very pleased that the variety and quality this year was second to none - many thanks to the chefs and kitchen staff.  All of the staff, from the managers to the gardeners are both professional and friendly and we truly feel we were spoilt rotten. Always a hello and a smile from everyone of them. Noticed some other reviews complaining that the staff do not speak English- the majority of the staff speak excellent English and the odd ones who don't can still communicate very well. Personally we are trying to learn more Turkish as it is us who feel ignorant not being able to communicate in their country. Looking…

title: Still heavenly
review: I reviewed this hotel i 2013. Went back recently for the third time. I think the hotel has had to cut back on some things since 2013, but they have increased their environmental awareness,  and this is still quite close to heaven from the viewpoint of a frozen Scandinavian. Lovely beach, fantastic food, great staff, comfy bed. The hotel is situated in a pine forest surrounded by immaculate gardens. Side town is a nice beach walk away. I'll be back...

title: Super Side
review: Just returned from a week at this resort, what can i say! cannot wait to return. Everything about the hotel, the staff and the food is great. This hotel offers everything you could wish for, great weather, lovely people and very relaxing.  We met lovely people, Hi Frankie, Emma and Bethany. Lauren and Kieron, we will see you when you get home.

title: great holıday
review: We had a seavıew room whıch was clean and great maıd servıce All staff were frıendly and helpful and I would throughly recommend thıs hotel to anyone The food was amazıng ın all the restaurants dont hesıtate just book you wont be dısappoınted

title: Great hotel in an ideal location 😄
review: Stayed 10-17 Sep 17. Antalya airport is 35 miles away which translates as approx 1 hour by coach to the resort but we dropped off at 3 hotels on the way which meant it was a 90 min journey to our hotel after a late flight so at little frustrating and unexpected given it was published by TUI as 35 mins!  The hotel itself is excellent with ample space and more than enough loungers to go round-either at the pool side or within the sea front gardens so no rush to find one! We arose about 11 most days and had no trouble.  The hotel free WiFi is excellent and proved to work very well throughout our stay.  The evening entertainment is excellent and generally rotates between the main bar, small amphitheatre or on the beach/pier so lots of choice.  The only reason I give this hotel a…

title: Mrs sarah Bullen
review: Would thoroughly recommend this hotel it's amazing !! Beautiful setting...gardens are lovely...staff can't do enough for you so friendly...Food was great so much choice...also great having the separate fish,Chinese,steak and Italian restaurants...can not fault This hotel will definitely return Was sad to leave ...Thank you Hotel Turquoise for a wonderful holiday

title: Great hotel
review: We have been at the hotel for 11 nights and have 3 to go, so can give a fair opinion of the hotel. We are in a sea view premier room in the main block. I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel and would return. Our room is excellent with a great view. There is noise from the entertainment until about 11pm, but we have not found this a problem. The staff at the hotel are first class. All Very efficient and very friendly. As far as the food is concerned the guest is spoilt for choice. The buffet restaurant is amazing and the red, white and rose wines are all drinkable! The Alacarte restaurants all had good reports, especially the fish and Turkish. I can recommend  visit to the steak restaurant (an extra €10 per person), but well worth it.  There is a silly culture of…

title: Paradise of Nightmares
review: You have to read this review before you book this hotel, my professional specialization is in “service quality”, and what I do for living is assessing entities in terms of service quality and excellence. My stay in this hotel was for holidays not for business, but I think my profession has to follow me, and although I had a terrible experience in this hotel, I will try to be very objective in writing this review as possible.  Short Summary:   DON’T STAY IN THIS HOTEL because most of the staff are very rude, disrespectful, can’t speak English, and may suddenly decide to shout at you in front of others for no apparent reason, or for a rule they have just invented, (the management is doing nothing about it). Worse than this, if you approached the front office and asked to speak to…

title: Holiday
review: Amazing hotel and got treated like royality on my birthday free champagne and a room upgrade. The food and facilities are outstanding and the staff make you feel so welcome would deffo go back in a hrartbeat.

title: Unsatisfactory work of animation team
review: We ve been loyal fans of this hotel for nine years,we love it for its amazing surroundings, beautiful garden, perfect sea, excellent food and very friendly service that makes you feel a special and remembered guest. This year everything is in place,moreover, food and restaurants have become even better and more various. So, thank you, hotel s management for this wonderful renovation. However, what has changed for the worse is animation-it is not a team at all, they are neither friendly nor interested, nobody greets the new guests,nobody says hello during the day, animators don t give information about the coming activities, don t invite guests to the activities and don't create the festive mood. Moreover, the announced activites often don t happen - bocha game for instance.…

title: Amazing hotel
review: Highly recommend this hotel from start to finish amazing we was greeted with a cold glass of champagne was informed of all we needed to know then our cases was took to our rooms while we enjoyed a drink the entertainment team here are amazing 😉 always something going on we had pool party’s pier party’s u really don’t need to move out of the hotel water activities on site, we often stayed up late from the club opening at 11-2 then up To the lobby where it’s lovely and cold for Drinks, food couldn’t be better something for everyone and with 3 teenage fussy eaters was all quite happy Italian is a must great service and beautiful food all in all we had an amazing time And will certainly return in the future

title: Average
review: We arrived after a very long coach transfer around 230am, the bellboy took all of our cases, (we was a party of 7 people, 2 teenagers and an 11 year old),  check in was quick and the cases were taken to our rooms, on entering the rooms there was a strong smell of damp also i was a bit disappointed  as the rooms were meant to be deluxe rooms and going by the photos on the website they didn't match up to them, rooms small and in need of a touch up here and there, clean and ok. food very much geared around the Dutch and very repetitive, entertainment not bad day time activities as expected. Hotel on the beach and has plenty of water sports and plenty of sunbeds there however if you want a bed by the pool you have no chance, i got up at 7.30 am one morning to get our beds and they…

title: Highly Recommendable Facility
review: - Facility: Not very new, not perfect in terms of architecture; however, very practical to find and reach any location easily. - Hospitality: efficient, multi-lingual, tolerant, perfect personnel. - Food: highly satisfactory in terms of quality as well as quantity. - Drinks: unlimited availability - Rooms: Satisfactory, could be better; efficient and remarkably quiet air-conditioners. - Parking: Not problematic, free of charge. - Negative aspects:    1-- The sun umbrellas at the beach are solid and therefore not much efficient; i.e. their position cannot be adjusted in line with moving sun beams. Thus not practical. This aspect should be takrn into account when time comes to replace the umbrellas with new and modern ones.    2-- The three a-la-carte restaurants are all perfect…

title: Not as good as it was
review: We were very pleased to be going back for our fourth time, but sadly some things weren't quite the same. Positives; Check in was very quick and the rooms are comfortable. We had a room on the 3rd floor with a sea view. Food is still excellent with lots of variety. The outside cooking areas have been updated and produce delicious food. Always plenty of tables and the restaurant waiting staff were very good to us. We didn't use any of the a' la carte restaurants purely because we have always enjoyed what's on at the buffet. There are always enough sunbeds, mainly on the beach later in the day. The 2 bands were very good too. Not so positives; The tables and bar stools at the beach bar are rusting and the table tops are peeling. They were painting over the legs one day, but that's…

title: What a Turkish Delight
review: We stayed at this hotel after it was put forward to us by our travel advisor and I must say what a great suggestion. This hotel has everything for all ages. Firstly the food is amazing and if you get chance to go to the Italian Restaurant (it’s free but needs to be booked) then go as it’s 5 courses of mouth watering Italian cuisine. Then there is the staff who are all very friendly and attentive and will do anything to make your stay a memorable one. Entertainment is ongoing daily from a foam pool party which had a sense if Ibiza about it with podium dancers and a live DJ ( not tacky just fun) to football matches around 5pm for sons, daughters and dads.... didn’t see a lady play but all welcome!! There is a daily darts competition, skipping on lilo comps plus many many fun…

title: Excellent Hotel with Great Amenities
review: We have just returned from this hotel with two teenage girls and we've all had a great time. The hotel is set in beautiful gardens, is very clean and has its own private beach. The entertainment is great with something for everyone including pier parties, pool parties and live music; however there are much quieter alternatives if you just want to relax. The food was really nice and the staff very friendly and helpful. The Italian al a carte restaurant is a must serving five courses of excellent food. Side is definitely worth a visit to see the ancient ruins and experience the shopping and you can either catch the bus or jump in a taxi just outside the hotel. The journey time is approximately 5 minutes. I would definitely recommend this hotel and would hope to return again.

title: AVERAGE
review: Gardens great but hotel needs updating, shower trays not stable , other guests made same comment poor quality .My wife fell over in the cubicle due to lack off stability of the tray. No beach to speak of.  But pool side entertainment great.

title: Lovely hotel with great facilities
review: This was our first time in Turkey, booked at the last minute and we really did pick a great hotel. The Turquoise has something for everyone.  The pool area is lively with fun games each day but no really loud music.  There are many sunbeds dotted around but to  get a prime spot with umbrella you will need to get up very early! The evening entertainment was excellent with 3 different live bands in the one week we were there, plus a pier part and theatre shows.. There are a lot of outside  areas to sit and a huge outside restaurant area which was great. The large Sultan bar is also outside and a fun place in the evening. The food was very good for an all inclusive with the buffet having one of the largest selections we have experienced. We didn't get around to the A la carte…

title: Very Very Good
review: We have just returned from a weeks holiday at Turquoise and can say it is good value for money. We had a good sized room with one of the most comfortable hotel beds I have ever slept in. The gardens around the hotel are immaculate. The main restaurant was ok but nothing special however the Al a carte restaurants were excellent. Especially the Turkish and the fish restaurant which was the best fish restaurant we have ever eaten in! The spa facility was excellent with very friendly staff. I recommend you have a hamam bath at the start of your holiday to ensure you get a very good and even tan. There is also a small gym which is air conditioned and an indoor pool.  The down sides would be people queue jumping at the bars and the having to get up early to get a decent sunbed. This…

title: Beautiful hotel resort with very friendly people
review: Very good all in hotel resort at 8 minutes from Side. Hotel is in a beautiful garden with bananas and lemon trees and lots of pines. Activities for everyone: mini-club, disco on the pier, foam party, live music for teenagers and adults, etc. Evening dîner on the outdoor terrace is great. Personnel is very friendly and alwayd helpful.

title: Nice enough but not 5*
review: We had pleasant enough stay in the hotel but we wouldn’t come back. Location is nice, in a middle of a pin forest however if you are looking for a beach holidays you may be very disappointed. Beach Is relatively small and not very clean.  Hotel feels more like a holiday village than 5* resort and gets really busy around the main pool and noisy at night.  Food could be a better quality specially on a meet and fish front. We were really disappointed by the service. We find most of the staff rather rude. We understand is a busy hotel but we felt very rushed around meal times which is not ideal if you with kids. Staff is very quick to take your plates away and not very attentive. They also very rigid if it comes to meal times. We were ask to leave the main restaurant while our…

title: Amazing hotel and amazing people!
review: We all really loved this hotel and stayed in it 2 times in a row already. Both times we were amazing by the endless buffet where you can even know where to start at! There is something for anyone to eat, and so many opportunity’s. This hotel is a perfect all inclusive hotel!  There are a lot of bars everywhere and getting something to drink is really easy even when we’re at the beach.  Also the employees were amazing, they were all so kind and giving them a tip was a sure thing for us everyday. (Cleaning lady’s, Barkeeper, waitress etc.)  Once I felt really bad because I was too long in the sun, and the cleaning lady noticed it and made my room a little earlier so I could lay down again.  This was such a nice gesture! I was amazing   The beach at the hotel was beautiful and…

title: Stay in paradise.....
review: I spent 10 wonderful days with my friends in this hotel. This is a great place, fantastic service and facilities.In addition, it is a place where miracles happen ....:) I would like to thank Mr. Behcet Hoca from the reception, who with great commitment helped my friend to recover the wallet lost in the city bus. It was unbelievable and we are very grateful for his help, kindness and huge effort. Congratulations to the owners of the hotel that they have such a wonderful Staff!!!!  We were so heavenly there that we will definitely be back soon :)

title: Superb Honeymoon
review: This was my third visit to this resort.  It is so highly regarded we went for our honey moon.  We were not disappointed.  Little extra touches such as chilled champagne chocs roses plush bedding etc in our room.  Fully stocked mini bar.  Fabulous sea view.  Plenty of restaurants and bars very friendly and polite staff. Sunbathing on the jetty was amazing.  Pool party and pier party were great.  Nothing too much trouble.  Spa treatment everyday!  They sorted out a trapped sciatic nerve.  It was bliss.  Highlt recommend the steak house.  Also visited the salon for nails and husband had a Turkish shave.  The jewellers is great and not pushy at all.  Super water slides.  Cannot wait to return.

title: Much better than we expected
review: We preferred for our family holiday. It was really good place. The waiter and waitress, food and entertainment activity were perfect. We just had a bit problem with housekeeping service. But customer relations solved our problem immediately.

title: 11th - 25th July 2018
review: We just got back from this amazing hotel early this morning - wish we were still there. The transfer from Antalya airport took about one hour but I presume that this would depend on the number of drop offs. The hotel, whilst large, is spread out over a number of building in a rambling estate some 3.5km East of the town of Side in the Antalya region of Turkey.  We were fortunate to get a Superior room on the first floor of the  main building facing the sea. The room was quite large compared to some we've stayed in and well laid out. We couldn't hear anything of the neighbours even though we knew the rooms were occupied. The only problem we had was from the people above us who liked to drag furniture around at silly hours on a couple of days. There are a number of restaurants…

title: Hols
review: Very good hotel,  food fantastic lots of choice,  drinks realy good,  again lots of choice, gardens are beautiful and so well kept,  we had garden room no.  4111 and we loved it,  so if you are giving tips don't forget the gardeners,  all staff very friendly and helpful,  evening times pretty special,  pier partys a couple of times a week, live music every other night,  and shows in the amphitheater , also pool partys at least once a week, ( great fun) and we are in our fifties,  couple of things that could be improved,  hotel had relaxation pool for over 16s only couple of times we went there,  there were kids in the pool splashing about and parents didn't bat an eyelid, on one occasion it caused a heated argument,  one other thing the snack bar is terrific,  great choice for a…

title: Lovely hotel, very happy with our stay
review: Hotel in general - Lovely atmosphere and decor. Has some cats living on site - Obviously there's a bit of a feral cat problem in Turkey and I was happy to see the hotel taking care of the cats by feeding, vaccinating, de-fleaing etc. The cats don't really cause any problems at all and I'm sure other animal lovers would love seeing them there too!   The room - Our room was lovely - Great air con, nice balcony. TV, huge shower, and MASSIVE bed which was so comfy. We genuinely didn't want to leave the room sometimes. The minibar is completely free and restocked with all sorts of drinks every day which was great.   General area - All of the hotels in this area are quite secluded, there is not much unless you go into the actual town in Side where there is shops, restaurants, ancient…

title: Lovely place to stay in Side, Turkey
review: Had a lovely stay, well managed hotel. Everything is clean and tidy. Very pleasant staff, managers seem to be on the ball, always walking around checking that people are having a great stay. We stayed for 2 weeks and thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it.

title: Fabulous holiday.
review: Have just stayed here for 10 nights with my boyfriend. We booked with Tui, who are always great. We arrived at about 12:30 at night, were greeted well and sat down, the guy gave us a quick over view of things as we were very tired. We were then pleased to hear we could go and eat - no hot food, bread, meats, fruit and cereal. Our room was beautiful. Any view you get will be good as there’s so many trees etc. Air con was great, especially as it was so hot. We only really sat around the main pool, and at the beach. There’s piers in the sea you can jump off and swim too! Lots of entertainment. All brilliant, not just silly shows, actual dancers. Not sure why people have complained about the food, I’m an extremely fussy eater and I thought it was brilliant. Pasta chips fruit any…

title: Rubbish hotel
review: Very crap service from everyone who works here very rude members of staff food is horrible very little to do the entertainment staff are not very friendly a waste of my time and Money Plz do not come here

title: 5*holiday
review: I would recommend this hotel to everyone! From the moment we got there we were treated very well. Champagne on arrival and a welcome from the reception staff. Food is amazing, tasty and a lot of choice. I recommend you try the Italian restaurant where the service is second to none. The room I had was a standard room with balcony but was excellent and the mini bar was restocked every day and part of the all inclusive deal. The waiter service in the evening when the live bands were on was also very good. The 3 pools were very clean.  Everything about this hotel was excellent. And the air conditioning was a god send as we had 38 degree heat most days.

title: Holiday with the family 4th - 11th July 2018
review: Overall a lovely clean modern hotel with friendly staff, a wide variety of tasty food, great entertainment in the evening, lots of water sports off the beach and super weather! We stayed in a deluxe sea view room which also had a view of the pool. Our bed was the most comfortable bed you could have wished for and we also had really comfy pillows. To be warned though, for those booking the sea view rooms and wanting peace and quiet!! Our sea view room over the Sultan bar faced over the evening entertainment stage and over the lounge that has a massive screen that showed football whilst we stayed there so lots of loud cheering! There is no quiet time if you want to turn in early and have a read as the entertainment is very, very loud and we also had all the noise of the other…

title: Family Holiday July 2018
review: My family and I have just returned on 11 July. We had a great time, the hotel was nice and modern, staff were friendly and efficient, the food was really nice with a large variety.. couldn't really fault it, the only criticism I would have of the food would be the Chinese a le cart. Starter was sushi (Japanese) my main was fish which turned out to be battered and came with tartar sauce and a spoon full of rice, my daughter in law and her daughter had satay turkey, expecting turkey on a skewer with a satay sauce turned out as a thin fillet of turkey smothered with peanuts and then roasted which made it dry and had no sauce. We then ate in the outside Turkish restaurant, the food was lovely but it took a long time to be served which was only a problem as it made us miss the first…

title: Relaxing and enjoyable
review: We visited in June with another couple. We all arrived with some trepidation having read a few poor TA reviews. We should not have worried! The Turquoise delivered a very good all inclusive holiday experience which we all agreed was above our expectations. We ate at 5 of the Al a cart restaurants which all delivered an enjoyable experience with lovely food. The Steak, Greek and Chinese were particularly good. With the Fish and Italian being very acceptable. We also went and ate in Side one evening at the excellent Ocakbasi Restaurant (recommended). Yes the Turquoise is AI and there are guests who ‘grab’ too much food, push past you at the buffet and are rude to the staff. Slow down take it easy (your on holiday) and be kind to the staff as they work very hard. You may have to be…

title: Our First All Inclusive Holiday
review: Myself and my better half had not yet been away on a proper all inclusive holiday and boy did we find value for money with Hotel Turquoise. Simply brilliant.
