We did not feel the need to go to the A la Carte restaurants because of the varied choice.  The meals are cooked outside as well as the hot food indoors in the buffet, too many choices to list here but the BBQ'd pepper steak, grilled salmon, and spiced Turkish…

title: Nowhere near a 5 star hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your long and positive review. We are very happy that you have enjoyed your stay and would love to welcome you again next year.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: 30 years old and looking for a holiday romance?
review: The food is vers poor,and the rooms neet a refit very old . The bathrooms are hot clean and also very old . The animation for kids are oké . Not really a 5 star hotel ??. For me just 1 time hollyday .

title: Rooms with seaview also have a very noisy entertainments area outside.
review: Rooms comfortable and clean. Amenities acceptable. Food good but a-la-carte dining excellent--- 5 nights of these meals are free and available on 7 nights and the same on14 nights visits. Older clients had some effect on reducing childrens noise

title: Excellent
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Excellent
review: Just returned from a 10 night stay at this hotel, upon arrival we were welcomed with a glass of fizz, we travelled with friends and booked together so expected rooms near each other this is when we found out we had 1 deluxe and 1 standard, our mistake but our Thompson rep was called and sorted us with a deluxe room which happened to be right next door to our friends. (so was it our mistake) anyway not a problem we paid the extra to upgrade. Have to say our Thompson rep Lucia was brilliant couldn't fault her. The rooms were lovely big spacious bed, t.v stocked fridge and an amazing shower. Cleaned every day to a high standard.  The food was plentiful and plenty of choice, even the fussiest of eaters would of found something to eat and if not the chiefs would of accommodated, and…

title: Another great hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your long and positive review. We are very happy that you have enjoyed your holidays. We hope you will visit us again.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Perfect last minute escape.....
review: My friend and I booked the Turquoise hotel 3 weeks before and we got an excellent deal with Thompson £460 for AI Ultra which was absolutely perfect. The setting of the Turquoise is fab, set amongst the pine trees you sometimes found it hard to believe that the sea was only a few metres away. Lots of Germans but they were polite and put us to shame with their excellent English! The piers out into the sea are lovely and refreshing as the breeze is perfect. We walked into Side town only once as we got pounced on by greasy Turks so never went back. The staff in the hotel were always smiling and helpful. The restaurants were clean and food was plentiful. The cocktails were excellent especially the mojitos! Towels provided for the pool. Rooms were spacious but we left our room at 8.30…

title: Fantastic hotel!
review: We were welcomed with a glass of champagne on arrival. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel is spotless. The food is fantastic and loads of variety. The a la carte restaurants are all really good as well with the exception of the Chinese which was a bit bland. The piers with sun loungers are beautiful and really relaxing. Close to side with the dolmas stopping right outside the hotel.  The rooms are a good size with balconies. Double bed, tv, small table and chairs, really spacious and lovely bathrooms with large shower.

title: Good holiday! Good 4* Hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your opinion. We are happy that you liked our rooms, food  and hotel grounds so much. We hope to welcome you next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: brilliant holiday
review: Currently sitting in the lobby as I write this! This is a good hotel with both pros and cons..  PROs  - We booked with Thomson and so on arrival we were greeted at reception and given a briefing.. With champagne! Given room keys etc and details for the welcome meeting the following day  - Thomson Rep Lucia was amazing very helpful, friendly and informative   - The pool was lovely big enough for everyone! The hotel staff especially a lady called Nika, were very friendly and there's lots to do entertainment wise during the day! There's plenty bars by the pool so don't have to walk to far and to add to this is a long strip of beach and places for Water Sports..   - There is entertainment every night a mixture of live music, shows in the theatre such as dancers and acrobats, and…

title: Highly  recommended
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for the review and all the details.   We write all the details about the rooms and publish updated photos on our web page and send them to the travel agencies.   Our standard rooms are located in the annex buildings and have garden view. In the main building we have deluxe rooms - in these rooms there iare bathorobe, slippers, safe and bier included in the room price. They are available with garden or sea view.  Our kitchen is appreciated by all our guests - we have a wide selection of international and turkish cuisine. We will control your remarks about a la carte to improve our services.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Great hotel
review: Decided to have a last minute break for some sun and having been to Side on a day trip last year  wanted to visit for a weeks r&r. Fabulous hotel and so peaceful set in Sorgun forest. Just a dolmus ride for 1 euro so able venture further if so desired into Side itself. Food very good and available 20 hours a day . Used 4 of the 5 a la cartes and enjoyed each one, my favourite being the Turkish restaurant as outside in the warm night. Staff always helpful and every where kept impeccably clean. Would highly recommend a holiday for relaxing here as could find no fault.

title: Turquoise Hotel. Does what it says on the tin.
review: Just returned on Tuesday from our second visit to this lovely hotel .set among fragrant pine trees in the forest at Sorgun Mevki it has everything you could wish for to ensure a most enjoyable stay and as a result I felt prompted to write my first ever review. The staff are very helpful, food excellent and varied and the weather for the most part exceptionally hot,albeit it felt like home on the first full day as we had thunderstorms which drove me crazy, There are plenty of shaded areas in which to unwind if it gets too hot for you and in spite of the common gripe about sunbeds which never ceases to amaze me they are plentiful and never difficult to find..  The hotel has two boardwalks at the end of which you can sunbathe , swim in the sea or simply feed the fish with the bread…

title: Vacation Update
review: Dear guests,  thank you for adding your very first comment on trip advisor. We are very happy that you have enjoyed your second stay at Hotel Turquoise.   We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Vacation , our first visit .
review: Just got back from the Turquoise. Great staff, excellent food, brill weather except for the first two days - thunder storms.  Not many English guests about but the Dutch and Scandinavian's more than make up for this. Wonderful people.  Found the Germans rude to staff. No please or thank you! Slight disappointment was a pervert on Motorised vehicle - but not much the hotel could do.

title: Brilliant hotel.
review: Dear guests,  thank you for writing a review on trip advisor. We are an international hotel and have guests from all over the Europe.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Good but not the Best
review: Great place , quiet !!! No loud guests ;) no youth , not à huge park with slides but focused on quality for good food , clean, friendly staff and guests relaxing. Entertainment but not too much and a great wellness !!! Hamam and massage are great !!!!!!!

title: Amazing Hotel.
review: We arrived at the hotel  late afternoon on the 8th September 2015, with my Wife and her Parents, as we checked in we were asked to  take seat and relax, while they completed our check in, a little later the receptionist came over and informed us that if wanted we could up a free upgrade to a three bedroom villa, with it own private pool and restaurant for breakfast and lunch, after we unpacked we sat on a private patio, when a young waitress came over asking if we would a drink from the bar. From this point the Holiday got better and better ( I had informed guest relations that it was my wife birthday the following day) after spending the day at the beach we returned to the villa, to find flowers and a bottle of champagne for her birthday, we then went have dinner in main…

title: The setting was just wonderful .
review: Dear Andy S.,  thank you for adding a comment on trip advisor. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay so much. Hope to meet you here next year!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Amazing! (Until the last day)
review: Our first visit to Turkey so didn't know what to expect, well it was all good. A big hotel but you never seemed to be crowded. Lots of sun beds in all areas of the grounds. Don't put your towel out before 9am and leave it or they will take it away, I watched it happen. Staff were always happy to help and always wanting you to get involved in all the activities.you have to take the bus into Side 1€ each, the old side is full of shops and you can get some good bargains, most of the shop owners are friendly and will have a laugh with you. Food at the hotel was good, we managed to book 3 of the restaurants well worth a go but do it as soon as you can as they get booked up very quickly. We would go back and take less luggage so we could fit more clothes in from the shops.…

title: great hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your positive review. We hope to welcome you next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Summer holiday
review: We booked this holiday well over a year before we travelled and we had made the decision based on the scores given in the Thomson brochure and the feedback from Trip Advisor.  We were definitely not disappointed with the hotel.  The room was clean and well equipped and our maid was really helpful and polite.  The hotel offers a lot of places to eat and drink depending on what suits you (we prefer quiet).  The buffet seemed to quieten down around 8pm and the al la carte, which you can book 3 out of the 5, were very well presented with a lovely relaxing atmosphere.  As you cannot reserve a sun lounger until 9am (note: your towels will be taken and you will be charged (Which is a good thing)), the restaurant does get very busy at 09.05!   All the pools and slides are very good but…

title: 9th visit, and still love this place
review: Back from yet another visit to the Turquoise, 9 in total, and again had a fantastic time, met up with friends we made last year, and also made new friends,  Its pleasing to see that staff remember you from previous years, and are friendly and he,pful. food, service, amenities, staff are all fantastic, nothing is ever a problem, i laugh when i see reviews about arrival times, rocks in the sea etc, not the hotels fault, travel agent and nature to blame for those.  i have been to various hotels in Side, Manavgat,Lara Beach, and none are a patch on this.  Regarding the staff, everyone of them smile and  stop for a chat, even though they work extremely hard,    this has now become a cosmopolitan hotel where there are guests from all over Europe, and all those we have met over the…

title: great hotel!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for the review. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay and would love to welcome you next year for the 10th time.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: amazing holiday
review: very beautiful decorated lobby and bar - nice and spaceful rooms - very good kitchen with good variation - in the evening nice shows in the theater - super friendly and helpful personnel (Dutch speaking ladies at reception and guest relations!) the hotel was fully booked but the coordination was perfect : no empty plates at the buffet, no waiting time in the bars,.. one of us had to stay at the hospital : the staff was very supporting and one came to the hospital with flowers! Thanks

title: Wow!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your opinion. We do our best to provide great service to our guests.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Very good hotel
review: my wife and i have just returned from 10 fabulous days at hotel turquoise,hopefully it won't be to long before we return . everything about the hotel is amazing, nothing is to much trouble for the staff to look after you they make you feel special. our deluxe room 1333 was lovely nice and quiet and kept spotlessly clean. the food at the main restaurant is good and plentifull but our favourite for lunch was the snack bar with amazing jacket potatoes. also you must visit the nomad tent for special turkish bread. the a la carte restaurants were very nice ,the best being the steakhouse even though a set menu it was fantastic. the hotel grounds were stunning the grass area ideal for sunbathing and relaxing. the pool area even though a little noisy is good and the beach is lovely and…

title: A second time staying!
review: We went there for the second time. Again, a fabulous experience in a hotel, with lot green areas! The food is still one the best in this splendid hotel with a kind and  polite staff. The whole personal are verry friendly, and they help you wherever they can! Our whole company has decided to spend our next holiday is this hotel again. The animation team has been renewed, and they try to make  your holiday full of fun!

title: Staff friendliness and pine forest location overpower all issues
review: Dear Bazeikse,  thank you very much for you good review. See you next year then!  Best regards  Hotel Turquoise

title: Hotel Turquoise
review: Staff is excellent in all aspects. Hotel is located in a mature pine forest which in combination with the sea makes air unforgettably fresh. Pros: + Staff service + Location + Delicious food Cons: - Sharp stones on a beach and in water (poor, not even an average sandy beach) - Old facilities (functional but not always), lots of scratches, patches etc. - Small beds and shower rooms - Bland design (simple with no features), can't even call it boring as it doesn't exist, just walls (garden and pine forest makes the difference) - Noisy and dirty aircons (even after complaining to reception twice) - In some places you can see plinths are falling off, paths tiles cracket  In the first few days issues get under your skin but by the end of the stay you will be relaxed by friendly people…

title: Amazing
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review and suggestions - we will control all of them to improve our services.  Please note that because of the sea turtles caretta caretta we can not remove anything from the sea  that's why we recommend taking special swimming shoes or getting into the sea from one of our two piers. Our beds are 180 cm x 200 cm big.   Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Lovely hotel, fantastic holiday!!
review: we have had 12 days at a fantastic hotel . Staff are great and friendly .nothing is a problem . We were upgraded to deluxe room with out asking . The food is fantastic . Different theme every night would be suprised if you can't find something to eat . Bad choice would be down to you . The chefs are great . The sun beds can't be reserved till after 9am . If some one leaves a towel down . They take it away and leave a sticker . You clame it back at towel desk . I have never seen a hotel with so many staff cleaning , mending . Grass cutting . Serving . The hotel is 5 star . It has every thing . Shops ,pools ,quiet areas . Activates . Bars . Beach .jetties . Water activities .  I would definitely come back to this hotel next year with out a doubt .

title: Pure quality
review: The title says it all ? The hotel was fantastic in every dept, spotlessly clean,the food was amazing and the staff so pleasant and happy to help you out.Special mention for Adem at pool bar he is a top lad. The animation team especially Natali were so energetic and giving us all things do do if we wanted too obviously. And finally Gokhan or johan as pronounced at hotel bar was the life and soul of bar and very effecient and good entertainment throwing his ice and catching has ha "and dropping" ha ha. The hotel is highly recomended with or without kids "it was a joy"

title: Amazing Hotel, clean,friendly
review: Dear guests,  it was a big pleasure for us to read your review. Thank you for your positive words!  We hope to welcome you next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: This place amazed us?
review: Our room looked over trees, even though this is a large hotel it doesn't, t seem it.  The room was very clean and comfortable with everything we needed.  I have never seen so much delicious food, the variety and quality was outstanding.  Can,t wait to go again.

title: Very good, apart from few  niggles
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your positive review. We hope you will visit us next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Take me back now!!!!!!
review: After 3 day's I was calling my travel agent to extent our trip for a few day's. That's how much we liked it! Food was very good, with lot's of choice from live cooking. The desserts.... Well go look at it. Awesome. Kids club was very nice, people were friendly for us and the kids!! Pool is too cold for october

title: Lovely hotel & great for older kids
review: We all (2 adults , 11 yr old boy & 14 yr old girl) loved this place. Very difficult to fault- yes it's a big place but you don't feel it's too busy as the grounds & facilities are vast with many different place to choose from for sunbathing; on the lawns, near the pools, on the beach areas or on either of the 2 sea platforms / piers. Also the main buffet restaurant is very big; no queuing & food always  available during open hours. There's also other dining options which you have to pre-book; the Italian al la carte was delish! Everything is managed almost military style from cleanliness to service. The kids loved the water slide area & there where plenty of other activities available if you do desired. My only issue , & it is only a slight issue, is with the labelling of good…

title: Good Run Hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you for review. We will take your suggestion into account for future improvements.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: This is one of the large scale hotel complexes on the shores of the Gulf of Antalya in the area of Side. This hotel has a particularly nice location being in the middle of a preserved pine tree forest. Most of the Side area has no trees at all, so this one is special. There are a few large underwater rocks about 50m from the beach. The waves break there and it is not recommended to try to swim over them. Luckily there is a very long pier and you can get into the water behind those rocks for a swim in more clear water. The water towards the beach is getting dirtier over the day, but this seems to be a natural phenomenon due to the currents. The water gets mixed with sand and some dead underwater plants so it looks brownish. The rooms are nice and very clean and so is the whole…

title: Fabulous...
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your review and suggestions. We will control them to improve our services.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: We weren't disappointed!
review: I spent two wonderful weeks at this hotel in August with my two teenage children.  The hotel and grounds are beautiful.  The staff work incredibly hard everywhere in the hotel - they are a real credit.  The no reservation of sun beds before 9am is also an excellent policy which is enforced.  The food was excellent and certainly the best at any all inclusive we've stayed at.  We managed to book 3 Al La Carte restaurants and these were also excellent.  The entertainment was the best we've ever had - Moscow State Circus has to be one of the favourites!  Even though the hotel was full (I believe 1400 guests) at no time at all did it feel like it.  There was always somewhere nice to sit in the grounds and we never had a problem finding a table for lunch or dinner.  It felt really…

title: Best Hotel in Side by far!
review: Just returned from a weeks hols at this fantastic hotel. Arrived very late,speedy checking and we had a deluxe room which certainly lived up to expectations. The hotel is immaculately clean, staff very friendly and the choice and quality of food exceptional. By far the best hotel we have stayed at in Side, and we would definitely go back again. Something for everyone here,, whether you want to laze by the quiet pool or be where the action is around the main pool, or chill out  on the beautiful beach. The restaurants cater for all, we particularly liked the outside restaurant for lunch, kebabs, jacket potatoes, salad and loads more...the patisserie is worth a visit or two:-) can't believe how quickly the week went, thankyou to all the hardworking staff at Turquoise, keep up the…

title: Amazing
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your positive review. It's great to hear that you liked your room, cleanliness and foor. We will be happy to welcome you again.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Amazing
review: Everything about this hotel was top class from the food to the entertainment. Cannot fault it one bit. Would definitely recommend it to anyone and would return to this hotel if I had the chance. If you are going to go to turkey, go to this hotel ☺

title: Shame about huge amount of Germans
review: Dear Mr. Adam,  thank you for the review and for recommending our hotel to other guests. We are very happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: fantastic holiday
review: I visited this hotel with my husband, children and parents. We had a fantastic time, room was lovely, staff very friendly especially Mehmet from the restaurant who my youngest boy took a shine too. Kids club was brilliant too, always something for the children to join in with if they wanted too and very friendly and helpful staff running it.  The pools are lovely and always managed to find sunbeds or the lifeguards would always get some. Would definitely like to return

title: Best hotel in Side
review: This hotel is perfect in all aspect. We had a standard room, it was perfect with a beautiful view to the garden, in a lovely small building (D block). We searched for a hotel in Turkey, which is green, with a big, shady garden and it was the best choice. The garden is well kept and beautiful like a botanic garden with rare birds and plants. The guests of the hotel are mainly from Western Europe: british, german, french, belgian, dutch people. There wasn't any problem with other guests (including children), everyone was OK. The food was very good also. There was a wide variety of dishes. Everyday there was a different special night (african, wien, turkish, asian, gala) with special dishes according to the theme. The gala night was the most generous one with fresh salmon, shrimp…

title: Very good
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! We are happy that you enjoyed your stay at Turquoise Hotel. Thank you also for positive words about our guest relation.  We hope to welcome you next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Great hotel
review: Pros: friendly staff, family atmosphere nice and clean pools, interesting night shows and well prepared Cons: lunch @ snack bar kept on serving same food, no variety. Stayed for 7 days yet was able to reserve at 2 out of 5 a-la-carte restaurants upon check in. Lobby area needs to be more lively

title: Not a 5 star hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for the review.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Everything was great
review: Just came back from this resort, its a great resort where most of the staff are friendly. The food range is good and food can be eaten almost 24 hours (from 12-7am the food range is limited). The catering staff were great in making food for my son who did not like the food available in the hotel. The rooms are good and clean (laundry for bedsheets is done on alternative days). Gurckhan from guest relations was also a gem who assisted in sorting out my sons food and listened to issues we had with the room and duly upgraded the room. There are several pools in the area (i) the main out door pool, (iii) a small outdoor pool for children (iii) a indoor pool (iv) a relaxing pool for over 16 year olds (v) private swimming pool for apartments.  The entertainment was great, the best…

title: Fantastic Hotel!!!
review: We spent an amazing two weeks in the Turquoise Hotel from the 5th June and it was the best hotel we have stayed in, in Turkey. We have visited a lot of different resorts and  hotels in Turkey for the past eleven years including Side three times as we love it, and this hotel surpassed them all. We traveled as a middle-age couple and normally stay in adult only hotels but we would not hesitate to return to this hotel as there are so many different areas to go within the grounds that it never felt full/busy. We met some lovely friendly people of different nationalities and it had such a family atmosphere, we felt we'd known everyone for years!!  From our arrival to departure everything was seamless. We were met by the lovely Gorkan and a glass of champagne late on the Friday night.…

title: A fabulous hotel!
review: Dear guests,  we are glad that your stay at Turquoise has met your expectations and that you have enjoyed it so much. We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Fantastic hotel, best yet
review: We are currently staying at The Turquoise Resort and spa and we are having a fabulous time. We arrived early Sunday morning at 1.00 a.m. and were warmly greeted by the Reception staff. The entrance hall to the hotel is spectacular. We We arrived at 1 a.m Sunday morning and were warmly greeted by the Reception Staff. We were offered a glass of champagne whilst seated as we filled out the paper work and the hotel's features were explained to us.  Unfortunately, my son's bed had not been made up but this was immediately rectified by Housekeeping. We have 2 beautiful deluxe rooms overlooking the Reception and they are reasonably quiet. When the balcony doors are closed you hear faint noises of the coaches coming and going- noisier on the balcony but ok. The hotel is immaculate and…

title: excellent Resort
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for writing a long and positive review while you are still here. We are very happy that you enjoy your stay. Thank you also for the suggestions, we will keep them in mind for future improvements.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Turquoise Hotel Side Turkey
review: We have just returned a  week ago from a two week holiday at the Turquoise. This hotel has it all. Beautiful and varied beach, Forrest,gorgeous gardens and just the right mix of relax and fun. I had booked the villas with their own pool area and although we only used this great, massive pool a few times to finish off, as we preferred to be amongst other people, it was such a lovely setting and we even had our own luxury sun loungers with our room numbers on them! The rooms were so spacious and really clean and I have never stayed anywhere in all my years of all inclusive travel with sooooo much cupboard, drawers and storage space, nor have I ever had such a fantastically working air con and constant water pressure at any time of day. Nor such a comfy enormous bed. Best of all in…

title: Fun filled but relaxing
review: We got to the hotel very late/early hours and was greeted by lovely helpful staff who gave us a cold drink and even colder face flannel. Much needed. On our first day we slept late and panicked as thought would be no sunbeds left. It was almost 11 by the time we had breakfast (by the way they have a late breakfast between 10 and 11). Although all the sunbeds had gone rounds the pools there were plenty on the beach and grass areas which both are a short walk to pools. I loved it on the beach as had the lovely breeze could swim off the fantastic piers and could dip in the pool if you fancied. We got up earlier for next few days if you want a bed round the pool I would say be down for 8am. Don't just put your towel down and go they will remove them if before 9. After nine you are…

title: A fantastic stay!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your good review. It's great to hear that you have enjoyed your holidays at Hotel Turquoise. We hope that you will visit us again.  Best regards  Hotel Turquoise

title: Second visit and it didn't disappoint
review: My husband and I stayed here for 11 nights in July 2015. From the moment we entered the reception area we knew we had made the right choice. The staff were friendly and welcoming and the reception area was large, well air conditioned and spotless. Our room was immaculate and the daily cleaning was faultless. Food was delicious. There was always something delicious on offer and the selection of fresh food, fruit and vegetables was excellent. The only complaint I have is that there didn't seem to be enough sun loungers for guests. On our first day, we came down to the pool after breakfast at around 9.30 and there wasn't a lounger anywhere. We searched in all the different areas but there were none. Staff were very obliging and brought us some immediately. My husband got up early…

title: Amazing holiday !
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your review. We are very happy that you had a fantastic stay.  We have plenty of sunbeds at the beach, at the pool, in the garden and on both piers but it can happen that all of them are occupied (especially in high season). As you said  our staff can always organize extra sunbeds for you, no problem at all.  Could you please write us a private message and describe the situation with guest relation? We would like to control it to improve our services.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Try it you won't be sorry
review: Just returned from Turquoise for a second year and I just love it. I actually got even more out of the hotel this year too; enjoying Julia's fabulous yoga classes in the garden after breakfast, relaxing in the hammam after lunch; and enjoying the great food, of which there seemed to be even more choice than last year.   My five year old son dipped in and out of the kids club at will, made some great friends through it and just loved Lizzy and Lisa, the girls running it. We would grab beds by the waterslide pool, right next to the kids club so he would wander in and out and we could always see where he was. The snack bar close by is also great for hungry kids burning off energy on the waterslides. And in the evening, the kids club girls come through the main restaurant at 8.25…

title: Splendid Holiday with Turquoise Hotel
review: We spent an extremely wonderful holiday with superior quality service and hospitality. Especially the hotel staff were so kind and helpful. I strongly advise those who want to spend a fantastic holiday in Turkey.

title: "As close to perfect as it gets!"
review: Dear guests,   thank you very much for your nice review. Hope to welcome you next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: All inclusive gem
review: If, like me, you read the many reports relating to your chosen destination, then you may have been a little sceptical of the wonderfully consistent reviews of the Turquoise Resort Hotel and Spa in Side. You need not be because as far as a Mediterranean hotel goes then this is about as close to perfect as it gets!  From the moment we arrived the staff were extremely efficient, professional and friendly and greeted with cold towels we were told that we had been upgraded to the Lake Apartments with our own private restaurant and pool.   The apartments (and everywhere else!) was very clean and tidy and well organised. The beds were large and comfortable, the air conditioning was efficient and not too noisy and the minibar and tea-making facilities were more than adequate.  Around…

title: Overcrowded holiday camp
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your long and positive review. We are very happy that you are recommending our hotel to other guests and would with pleasure welcome you next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Paradise to live in
review: Great hotel,   beautiful grounds maintained to highest level.  Staff mostly pleasant and very attentive,  nothing too much  trouble...  although some a little grumpy.  Entertainment good for the size of hotel,  always something to do other than sunbathe.   The hotel operates a no reserving of sunbeds  before 9am,  towels were removed from those whose beds were unoccupied.... although a lot of people just got to pool for 7 (and  before) and sat till 9am..... there was always a sun bed, but not a parasol..  the staff were on hand to fetch and carry sunbeds.    Restaurant very good choice of food from breakfast to dinner.  Air conditioning throughout.. a la carte restaurants available at no extra cost,  worth booking on first day as we only managed  to book 2 out of the 4.  Beach…

title: Nice Resort - recommend upgrading to Lakeside Apartment
review: Not long back from this resort and I thought I'd leave an honest review with some recommendations that my husband and I would have gone with (in hindsight) for anyone heading there soon or thinking about it.  Firstly - we wish we'd booked a private transfer to get to the hotel. We were the last drop off and arrived very late (and were pretty hungry - we managed to get some bread/cheese and cereal at about 1 30am).  We spent the first night in a double room in the main hotel but we upgraded through the hotel on the second day to a poolside/lakeside apartment, which gave us more space.  Standard of accommodation is the same - but they do have a bigger balcony.  The other benefit was the pool for residents only.  The main pool of the hotel is packed all day long and we never used…

title: A Really Great Hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you for your long review.  We are very happy that you enjoyed our food and Lake House concept and thank you for recommending this room type to other guests.   However we are surprised that you didn't like our wines. At the Turquoise Hotel in ultra all inslusive concept we offer Pamukkale wines, which are made of Anatolia's best grapes and 30% is being exported mostly to Europe.  We receive very good feedback from our guests about our wines.  Besides we have many other local and some import drinks free of charge (including whisky, rom, cognac, vermouth, liquers and tequilla).  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Best holiday ever!
review: Never having done an all inclusive before, I wasn't sure what to expect, but I was very impressed.  The facilities, the friendliness of the staff, the cleanliness, the food - everything was perfect. We upgraded to Deluxe room and it was spacious and had everything you could wish for.  The wifi even reached the beach.   I would definitely recommend this hotel and would stay here again.   We left the resort for two evenings and visited Side.  10 euros by taxi.  A lovely little town with great restaurants and shops.

title: Not a fault to be found!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your opinion. We are glad that your stay at Turquoise has met your expectations and hope to welcome you next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Do not think twice - BOOK it
review: We stayed for two wonderful weeks 20.06-04.07.2015 at this hotel and we've had the best Holiday ever. The two weeks flew by really quickly.  We had high expectations and we weren't disappointed. We stayed in a deluxe room, a little further from the main hotel, but it was quiet and we had the chance to go through the pine forest a couple of times per day. The rooms and the premises were spotless clean and it felt like the staff were working 24/7.Everybody was friendly and helpful and we never felt ignored or disregarded. The food was excellent and they accommodate every possible taste. The five a la carte restaurants  are a great alternative if you're looking for a more intimate atmosphere. The bars are ok, easy accesibility and they offer the widest variety of all inclusive…

title: Just back from two great weeks at Hotel Turquoise
review: Fantastic hotel in a great location.  Walk along the beach 40 minutes in Side (Roman site) great harbour, restaurants and shops.  Bus into Mangavat, market and Waterfalls.  Hotel was spotlessly clean, and never felt crowded.  Mainly Dutch, Netherlands, Belgium guests.  Sunbeds never a problem as cannot be reserved until 9am.  Great no getting up early, they have girls going round taking them off, unless you stay with them.  All hotels should operate the same policy.  Food was great, something for everyone in a lovely setting.  Lunch could be taken in main resturant or at the grill by the pool overlooking the sea.  5 Al a Carte restaurants all fantastic with great wine.  Although we never had children the kids club was a lovely room and great undercover outdoor play centre.  They…

title: Honeymoon in paradise
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review. It's great to hear that you liked our food, pools, jetties and entertainment.  We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: relaxing break
review: We spent our honeymoon here from 27th June to 7th July - from the second we arrived (although a little groggy from a delayed night flight) to the second we left we could not fault the place! Our room was decorated for our arrival as the hotel knew it was our honeymoon - lovely touch!  The grounds were immaculate, the rooms were clean fresh and bright the food was gorgeous - never got bored or felt it was repetitive as there was always something different on including themed nights and Al a carte (book when you arrive as they fill up quick and are worth the visit) - the staff are so happy and helpful - always smiling and are an asset to the hotel - drinks service is faultless, the second your glass is empty there's always a waiter(ess) around to bring you a refill. Entertainment…

title: Relaxing, Rejuvenating, Romantic Stay for us!
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review. We are very happy that you have enjoyed your honeymoon trip.  We ask our guests not to make a reservation of sunbeds before 9 a.m. We will control it.  We hope to welcome you next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Great Hotel and Staff
review: I have just spent a glorious week with my daughter at this hotel, the grounds are immaculate as is the hotel.All the staff were very friendly and courteous, nothing was too much trouble.The food was plentiful and to suit all tastes.plenty of activities daily with no pressure to join in.Our room was comfortable and clean, and our balcony overlooked the stunning gardens.A very picturesque setting, I would definitely return to this gorgeous hotel.

title: We have been to this hotel three times
review: We last visited this hotel about three years ago, which was our third visit. This is a fantastic hotel.  About 20 minutes walk along the beach to Side with its fantastic ancient history.  We first went there on a recommendation, and we were not disappointed The food is good, the rooms are good, the waiters are friendly and when they get to know you and what youdrink, perhaps after two or three days, your drinks are waiting for at your table, especially at lunch times. Entertainment is good. The outside eating area is segregated into smoking and non smoking areas. The rooms are clean and the people are very friendly and helpful. The all inclusive is for 24 hours. I would definitely go back.

title: june holiday
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a positive review. We will be happy to welcome you next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Great stay in Hotel Turquoise
review: stayed at this hotel 18th june  grounds are beautiful the gardeners work really hard to keep them perfect the staff really look after you plenty of sunbeds to be had the only negative i have was not much choice of food at lunch and dinner and when we went for our evening meal around 8pm the food trays needed filling up but the steak al a carte was great the tables were set around the pool which  was a lovley setting rooms were clean and comfortable and the mini fridge had water and soft drinks included in your all inclusive but found it hard to have to pay 14 euros per week for the safe never had that before in a 4 to 5* hotel thomsons platinum hotel this needs addressing .

title: Getting better and better!!!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your review.   We are happy that you liked our grounds, steak house and  rooms.  Safe is free of charge for deluxe rooms and lake houses/villas. In standard and family rooms you need to pay 2 EUR per day for the safe.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Best holiday EVER!!!
review: We did stay 17 days in June, had a standard room at the front just next to the main entrance (2nd floor). Totally not bothered by any noise of busses when balcony door was closed. Standard room not really large, but it offers all you need, as most of the time you will spent outside the room. Good shower, always warm water and good pressure. Hotel is located in nice, very well maintained garden, more then sufficient sun loungers around pool and beach. It s nice to see that no reservations are allowed before 9 in the morning, and finally a hotel that is also checking and removing stuff. Food is fantastic, buffet and ala carte as well.  Several activities during the day by great animation team, that leaves you alone if you like, but I would recommend to joy them, they are great In…

title: ### fabulous book now ###
review: Just returned from a week at this hotel and it's the best hotel I've stopped in. Hotel staff are very helpful and attentive, food is very good and so much choice for an all inclusive. Rooms are clean and modern. The Al a carte resteraunts are good we went to the Chinese, Turkish and steak house resteraunts and all easy to book into and food very good. All in all a fab holiday full of relaxation and just a plus note I am moaner when it comes to cheesy entertainment and though it does have it here the four seasons hotel was a big plus for the younger end of travellers like myself so was happy with that. Book now if you want a brilliant holiday at a brilliant hotel you won't regret it

title: Really nice hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your comment. We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Lovely all-inclusive hotel
review: Just had a great week here, chose a deluxe sea view room, fab.  Room 1265 Close to everything, other rooms in grounds seemed to have a bit of a walk.  Noise was not a issue, music finishes at a reasonable time.  Rooms were well appointed, spotlessly clean, hotel is modern and staff were all great.  Food good, can't fault anything.  We spent most of our day on the decks that stretch out in to the sea, great breeze and easy swimming with no walking on rocks.

title: Very nice resort with only a few development points
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your review.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Just back from Side.
review: We have just returned from 10 days at the Turquoise hotel in Side and would recommend the hotel to anyone wanting a relaxing holiday. The hotel is set within beautiful green gardens right on the seafront and is imacculately clean and well-maintained.  The hotel guests seem to be a mix of european clientele (mainly dutch and german) and some british and russian guests. Most of the staff speak good english and will go out of their way to make you feel welcome.  The food was of a good standard (especially the a la carte restaurants) and there was a decent selection of cocktails, spirits and beer (efes pilsner). Water is readily available and there are little baskets dotted around the resort to leave your empty bottles in. Our only minor comment about the food was that it was not…

title: We are still here!
review: Most people review on their return, but you can't get more up to date than this. We are on day 3. Booked on the Thursday as we flew last Saturday and we are so glad we picked this hotel. Great food, friendly staff, very clean, great rooms and just genuinely fantastic. Weather is hot, but not uncomfortable and the pool is never packed. Good music around the pool, not too loud. Major positives - you canave sun beds with your towel before 09:00, so there is no getting up at 6am to beat the Germans! Very mixed nationality of guests here, I would suggest mostly Dutch, Belgian, English, German and French in that order. Some Russian, but not sure as they kept themselves to themselves. Downside to the hotel is the food is too good which means I'm putting the pounds on and had to go out…

title: Excellent Hotel to recover from daily stress
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! We are happy that you enjoy your stay.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Friendly, warm and a most welcome hotel.
review: Very nice hotel, excellent food, very friendly personnel, nice evening programm if you need one:) nice pools for every taste, from children to very quiet, pool bars and direct access to beach and sea. I'll be back:)

title: Lovely hotel and staff
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay at Turquoise Hotel.  Best regards

title: Very Nice Place
review: My husband and l spent 2 wonderful weeks at the Turquoise Hotel. Stayed in a deluxe room, main building from June 2nd for 14 nights. Our room overlooked the restaurant with a lovely sea view, some reviews say these rooms are noisy, we are senior travellers and we found them fine. All the outside entertainment music finished at 11pm and moved to a disco. l can only say what everyone who writes positive comments, the food, ALL the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel was to the highest standard. First visit to the Turquoise but would love to return next year with our family which includes 2 grandsons age 4 and 8 . Well done Turquoise Hotel.

title: very nice resort, we felt welcome!
review: We booked 2 single luxe rooms but on arrival the hotel offered us a luxe villa room with 2 bed rooms, 2 bath rooms, a living room, a semi private pool, restaurant and bar. That was a very nice surprise. Change of towels twice a day. Breakfast we had in the smaller private restaurant where the staff was very helpful and friendly. Also in the main restaurants and bars the staff was super friendly. The grounds are very green, with trees and flowers and well maintained. Enough places to relax or to participate with the animation team. For sure we'll be back!

title: 2015 June - again splendid vacation in Turquoise!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for the review. We are very happy that you enjoyed our private restaurant 'Begonvil' for villas's guests, hotel grounds and staff.  We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Amazing holiday
review: We have been on vacation in this hotel for 4 times already. Again - the service, infrastructure, food (respect to cooks!), terrotory are on top! Pay attention to Water Sports - super professional and friendly team. New equipment. You can rent out canoe boat for 5 Euro. We use it everyday to sail down to Side. Beach - sand, but the are stones in water. that makes the water colour real turquoise! Beautiful territory - pinetrees park, fresh and serine aroma. We adore this hotel and recommend once again.

title: First class self-contained hotel
review: Dear Evgenia260,  thank you very much for your opinion. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay so much.  Hope to see you next year!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Amazing week away
review: I can not praise the hotel staff enough they all outstanding, from our glass of chilled champagne on arrival our luggage was delivered to our room by a very happy young man given that it was 2 am . The overall presentation of the hotel was beautiful what you would expect from this standard of hotel .Our room a garden room was well appointed cleaned everyday with fresh towels and bedding the fridge was kept stocked with water and soft drinks free of charge . Choice of  three pools, fitness centre and spa , the entertainment was good entertainment staff encouraging rather than demanding that you join in to pool games and so on . Food there was something for everyone and we had a wonderful week worth the 5 stars we would give it the grounds around the hotel are a glorious riot of…

title: Paradise
review: I went here on 2nd June with my partner for 11 nights, we both have busy stressful jobs and needed to chill out and relax.  We couldn't have chosen a better environment in which to do it.  From the moment we arrived until the day we left everything was perfect.  The room was lovely, partial sea view, with balcony, beautiful big bathroom, shampoo, conditioner and shower gel replenished as required. Hair dryer provided. Television behind the mirror opposite the bed was very impressive.  Mini bar restocked daily, Tea and coffee making facilities.  Facilities excellent, the hotel is on the beach where there are also 2 piers where you can soak up the rays.  The main pool is massive, room for a swim even during pool games period!! Fresh pool/beach towels daily.  You can join in with…

title: Excellent
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review. We are glad that your stay at Turquoise has met your expectations and hope to welcome you next year too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Extremely friendly staff
review: Just returned to the UK having spent eleven days at the Turquoise Hotel on an all inclusive holiday. The standard throughout the hotel was nothing short of excellent. The housekeeping and service you could not find better anywhere else. The staff are friendly and courteous. The entertainment varied and a high standard. The food very good. Well done Turquoise we had a superb holiday

title: Turquoise Hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review. We are very happy that you enjoyed our service and food.  Hope to welcome you next year!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: WONDERFUL TURKISH FOOD AND AFFORDABLE LUXURY NEAR SIDE- ROMAN RUINS
review: We arrived at the hotel and were welcomed by the very friendly hotel staff/ reception Sarah on the reception desk was absolutely amazing, bar staff were first class, food was not the best we had but still very nice. The entertainment was very good. Unfortunately the beech was very rocky and I would advise taking some protective footwear should you visit this hotel. All in all we had a lovely time and would go back again. Val and Brian

title: Excellent staff, amazing shows from animation team, great food, very nice hotel
review: We have been in similar hotels many times before. This one is really worth the price.  We very much enjoyed our stay, despite the not so nice weather in end of may. Very friendly and helpful staff.  Large variety of good quality food.  Very nice activities for the kids, not only simple pool games, but really nice things like scuba diving for kids, kite flying, etc.  The animation shows were unbelievable. In our 8 days stay, we saw breath-taking Chinese, Ukrainian, acrobat groups, an amazing Columbian dance show, live music and really nice clown-shows for kids.  If the weather was also nicer on top of that, we would surely not be able to convince the kids to return home.

title: Great hotel and location
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review. We are happy that you liked our food and kids animation so much.  We hope that you will spend your holidays at  Hotel Turquoise next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Very good hotel, great staff
review: Stay here for 10 night in sep 2014 and we had amazing time, food was very good and staff was mainly friendly all the time, there always something to eat, ice cream for morning to night, plus drinks such as cocktails was in with the all inclusive.   The shop within the hotel grounds wasn't great but you could get paper every day   The added bonus was the giant loggerhead turtles that kept popping up for air from the sea when you walk down the  Peers my wife really loved this, also in the evening we saw king fishers.  We will 100% go back one day.  W

title: Very nice resort!
review: Dear Jabnett79,  thank you for the review. Sea turtles caretta caretta are a highlight at Hotel Turquoise, we are happy that you have seen them.  We hope to welcome you this year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Beatiful villas
review: This hotel is a very good hotel. We booked this hotel because of the high rating here on Tripadvisor and it has not let us down.   The reception has always a Dutch speaking hostess, which is very handy when it comes to explaining problems. In our room, a part of the shower valve was missing and the technical department was within 30 minutes in our room.  The room where we stayed (1021) was a little bit noisy because of the door. Late bar-visitors came through the hallway which were hearable. The cleaning of the rooms starts quite early (around 9 am), but the cleaning is done very well. The sheets and towels are clean.  The food in the restaurant varies every evening, is fresh and tastes good. The waiters keep their area in sight very good because every time we had empty glasses,…

title: Beautiful place and first class service
review: My husband and I have just returned from a week in this hotel.  We went without our (now teenage) children for the first time just as a couple, so were looking for a high quality week.  I will review honestly.  1. I have travelled to over 60 countries now and have never had such a lovely clean hotel!  Hygiene and cleanliness was really first class.  Excellent cleaning staff - lovely sofas in lobby and I saw one maid, as she went past, just plumping up the cushions to make them look nice!   2.  Beautiful 5* hotel which I felt had a few little touches which took it to 5*plus.  e.g. mini bar was free, and bottles of water, which was really helpful.  Also, all around the resort, there were tasteful baskets for the empty bottles of water, which the staff made sure were collected at…

title: Beautiful place
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! We are very happy that you enjoyed it so much and that you recommend us to others.  We hope to welcome you at Hotel Turquoise next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Perfect stay
review: We stayed here the second week in May and the hotel appeared to be at capacity. This was a very good hotel both location and service wise.  It is very clean and spacious and the food good although the buffet area gets very busy in the evening.  The a la carte restaurants are excellent. Our room was overlooking the pool which meant it was noisy in the evenings when the entertainment was going on and sometimes this did not finish until midnight.  The entertainment provided was good as were all the facilities

title: Lovely!
review: Dear guests,  thank you for your review. It's great to hear that you liked our location, service and a la carte restaurant.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Excellent place for holidays
review: For me Turqoise Resort was the perfect place to stay in April. Very quiet at that time (it had only opened its doors again two days before), the service was good, the staff very friendly, the food tasty and over all a very nice atmosphere. Definitely going back!

title: Nice clean hotel...no air con in room despite advertised as such.
review: We stayed at the Turquoise the first week in May 2015. The hotel is clean and spacious. There are very good outside dining areas and plenty of sun loungers though the ones in the best positions go very early in the mornings. The rooms are well appointed. We had a delux room. Our major bone of contention was that although the room was advertised with air conditioning it is centrally managed by the hotel. Despite temperatures being in the high twenties we could not cool the room. We complained and were told that lots of people were complaining about the same issue. The hotel staff informed us that there is nothing can be done as they only allow guests to control the air con at certain times of year. For us this was a deal breaker and as such we won't be returning. The food at the…

title: Excellent hotel - Swimming with Sea Turtles
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review.  In the main building we have central air conditioning. From 20th of May till 20th of October it's working all the time. Before and after that time it's weather dependent and works at stated times. In annex buildings and villas there is individual air conditioning.  All the travel agencies we work with have all the details concerning air conditioning. This information is also included on our web page and in the fact sheets.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Simon
review: We had a great family holiday with 3 boys age 15,11 and 3. The Hotel was excellent, clean and the staff were very friendly. Our room was upgraded to a luxury villa with private pool :) The pools and slides were great fun for us all and swimming and snorkelling in the sea off the pier was incredible - We all swam with Sea Turtles, the most incredible experience. Side town is a great place to visit in the evening and lots of good priced bargains. We found the all inclusive food a bit disappointing - Loads of variety and on occasions some good food but generally a bit bland in taste. Did some watersports with the kids and went on an all day pirate ship excursion.

title: Night life
review: Dear Neil R,  thank you for your review. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay and the room upgrade. The sea turtles are a highlight in Turquoise, that's right.  Hope to welcome you this summer too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Holiday with family and friends
review: Late review,as I always forget until I go to book next holiday and read all reviews. My review is honest and as I found things at turquiose hotel. Hope this helps you all when deciding. Never been to Turkey before our holiday ( my partner, our 2 sons 17&16 and I, last Aug 2014). Things were perfect from arrival until departure. Cleanliness was impeccable, food was vast with many selections on offer and delicious, many activities in the daytime, or just relax ( your choice). Staff were very helpful, a credit which makes you understand how this hotel functions to what I must say as the highest of standards. Reason I am writing this review is that I am looking at returning this year with the whole of my family including grandson, as I am very confident to place all of my family…

title: Very impressed
review: This is a bit of a late review, but better late then never!  This was our 1st trip to Turkey and we were a bit nervous after hearing mixed reviews, but we really did have a wonderful couple of weeks.   We stayed for 2 weeks and were greeted at the hotel with a glass of bubbly and a friendly member of staff explaining all of the ins & outs of the hotel (restaurant times, how to book into the a la cartes, safe hire etc)  The rooms were basic, but very clean and spacious, all you really need.   We ate at all of the restaurants and recommend making the most of booking into the a la carte restaurants. Our fave was the turkish restaurant, the setting & atmosphere made for a really lovely evening!   The grounds of the hotel are well kept and although the hotel was at full capacity it…

title: Happy kids make happy parents !
review: Dear guests,  thank you for the review. It's great to hear that you liked our restaurants, animation and the hotel grounds.  We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel this year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: amazing!
review: Sorry for this late review, but I guess better late than never :-) We stayed at the Turquoise as a family of 4 ( 2 adults, 2 kids, aged 7 & 9) during the first 2 weeks of July 2014. It is a lovely resort in a beautiful setting, and even though at full capacity, you never had the feeling that you were cramped. We stayed in a family bungalow in the gardens, with 2 separate rooms. The bungalow was definitely spacious enough, well maintained, and maybe just a tiny bit dated, but because it was well maintained this was hardly noticeable. Overall the hotel is a very high standard, but maybe not as luxurious as previous hotels we stayed in ( Ali Bey Resort in Side, Paloma Renaissance in Kemer), so in that respect I would say a 4+* instead of a 5*. However, what really does make up for…

title: First holiday in Turkey
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review!  We are happy that you and your children enjoyed your stay at Turquoise Hotel. We hope to welcome you this season too.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Second time there
review: We visited this fantastic resort in the first week of august. We were greeted with scented,cold towels and drinks. The service was amazing, everyone was so kind and helpful. Even though it was one of the buisest times of the year, you never felt croweded or cramped. there is something for everyone no matter how old or young you are. We are most definitely returning in 2015, and are very excited for it!

title: Excellent
review: Stayed here for a week and enjoyed our stay. Our room was nice,spacious and was always kept clean. The hotel is surrounded by trees which was very calm and relaxing. Food is always available with a wide range of possibilities. We were never disappointed by the food, it was one of the best we ever had in a hotel. The pool and the beach both were good but it was hard to find sunbeds by the pool unless you went there really early. Pool animation was OK but the one at the amphitheatre was really disappointing. Drinks were good,staff was friendly. Overall, it's a fantastic hotel but lacks animation.

title: Very good hotel
review: Dear guest,  thank you very much for your comment. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay so much. Hope to see you next year!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Fantastic Hotel - views amazing!
review: Very good hotel in a lovely location.  We arrived around 10.30 to a lovely welcome of drinks and a smile. We soon found out that not everyone's rooms were ready and were given a room in the villas which albeit frustrating, was not too much of a problem. The next morning we were shown our rooms in the main hotel over looking the pine tress and front of the hotel, lovely room plenty of space and away from the main noise of the hotel. We soon found our way around the hotel and what it had to offer. We attended the Thomson reps meeting and found out about all the trips available. These are affordable and there is a good mix from waterfalls, boat trips to market trips.The young lady mentioned that the room issues was a common one and she went on to state that they over book rooms and…

title: Very Nice hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review!  Hope to see you next year at Turquoise Hotel!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Turkish Delight
review: Stayed at this hotel with friends this summer and traveled as a group. Found everything to be of a high standard, food, pools, facilities all excellent.   There is plenty to do day and night and always great food and drink available.   The views from the sea front were spectacular, would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent hotel near Side
review: Overall the hotel is great! -staff was very friendly -food was good -rooms (family suite) quiet, clean, and very nice -outdoor pools could be warmer in October (how about solar heating?) -beach sandy with pebbles and rocks, so one needs to watch out a bit -soccer field is great for kids

title: Total relaxation in Turkey
review: Dear RubertR,  thank you for your comment and suggestions.   Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Are Standards Slipping?
review: We arrived very late, well really very early on 27 September, to be met by a most welcome drink. Check-in was painless and quite quickly we found our way down to the "late meal"  We got into our rooms approx 3 am.  Our cases were delivered immediately so no delay in getting into bed! We were in deluxe sea view rooms, which were well worth the extra cost.  The beds were lovely and comfortable.  The only downside of the rooms, which wasn't a downside at all, was the dawn chorus performed by literally hundreds of sparrows in the pine trees. It was wonderful to wake up to and look out over the sea. Fabulous!   Shower in the bathroom was lovely.  The minibar was replenished every day and the room itself was kept spotlessly clean by the maids.  Cleanliness throughout the hotel was…

title: Such a shame
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! We hope that you will spend your holidays at Turquoise Hotel next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: fantastic holiday
review: This was our 3rd holiday here.  We posted an extremely positive review last year, and booked again immediately. But this year wasn't as good. Let's start with our 'garden view' room.  Still very nice, but the balcony was unusable.  Massive plants blocked sunlight, view etc. (see photo). Then there were other problems: 1. Booking a la carte meals.  The representative was not helpful and it was like pulling teeth to get what we wanted.  Compromised in the end.  Reminded us of the "computer says no" woman from Little Britain.  Then they cancelled our final night's booking due to lack of interest (4 days before the event!?!).  When trying to re-schedule bookings, there was absolutely no customer focus and a 'take it or leave it' attitude prevailed.  We were very upset.  Ended up…

title: Brilliant Holiday, On the beach :-)
review: If you are looking for a holiday which has everything then you will not be disappointed with this hotel and the price is good also. It offers everything you need, the food is lovely and has a great selection, plus you have 5 a la carte restaurants you can also book. The hotel is very clean, The staff are friendly and helpful. There is a bus stop outside the hotel for easy access into side or Magnavat for 3 Turkish lira 90p. The pool is clean and lovely, you are also steps away from the beach :-) I have now been twice and will probably go again its a great all round holiday.

title: Lovely hotel on the edge of a pine forest
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your comment. Hope to see you next year!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Excellent very large village type hotel.
review: This is a really lovely hotel set in beautiful surroundings.  Check in was quick and we were given a warm and welcoming introduction to the hotel  We were given a ground floor room in block C away from the main building. A porter showed us to the room and then brought our cases while we grabbed a bite to eat  If I was being picky, the furniture was a bit dated but the rooms were comfortable and kept exceptionally clean. The patio was surrounded by trees and plants- very peaceful and relaxing and we loved it. The mini bar was stocked every day. The food was the best All Inclusive  food we have experienced.  Loads of lovely fresh fruit and salads being freshly prepared for you and lots of choice of meat and vegetarian dishes.  Be sure to venture outside for even more choice. Most…

title: Great hotel
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! We are glad that your stay at Turquoise has met your expectations. Thank you for recommending us!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Best ever Turkey hotel
review: It is very difficult to find a fault with this hotel. Many bars and restaurants and superb service throughout the hotel. The fully inclusive bar had everything we wanted and although you could buy some drinks as they issued you with a credit card, we never found out exactly what was for sale. Whisky and Brandy were inclusive, as were the cocktails. There was a nice 40 minute walk to Side along the beach or a bus stop or taxi right outside the hotel. We had a sea view room which was excellent but as there were 14 in our party, we were not close to each other. The evening entertainment was usually very good and we always found seats to watch. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel and we will certainly go back again.

title: Excellent Holiday
review: Thank you hotel Turquoise for a wonderful holiday. It was our  first all inclusive and we were not disappointed. I can only agree with all the positive comments already said. Weather perfect, Clean and comfortable ( we found the beds very hard but somebody else may like them Hard!) Staff very friendly and efficient. We did find the food a bit bland but I loved the Bread and Butter pudding! Wish I knew about getting up early to see the turtles but maybe we will go back sometime.

title: THE TURQUOISE EXPERIANCE
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your opinion. Hope to see you next year!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Fourth Visit
review: This hotel fulfills almost all of your holiday needs, its beaches sea and proximity to a delightful Roman town, siday, satisfies the most discerning traveler. My partner and I have done some 10 cruises over 6 years and we regard the Turquoise hotel food to be superior in every aspect. The food is prepared and cooked in front of you, the vast choice of dishes and food in the buffet restaurant and barbecue areas serves to entice you to put on the pounds with gay abandon. We love this hotel because of its setting in a small forest, its design which has separate villas all connected by air conditioned walkways to the hub of the hotel. Its outdoor entertainment, artists and energetic dancers are a must to enjoy most nights with Turkey's fine weather. We have decided to return to this…

title: Excellent Holiday!!
review: Dear Steve,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review!  Hope to welcome you next year too!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Great hotel but put Air Con back on please
review: This was our fourth visit to this hotel. On our first visit we were the only English guest to get of the coach and wondered if the others left on the coach new something we did not. We were met at the edge of the pine forest and walked down the hotels drive as it was late at night and the hotel used to have a policy of not letting coaches down early hours of the morning. This year the coach arrived at the hotel and half of the coach passengers followed us into the hotel. This hotel is getting more British guest and the Russians that used to be at the hotel seem to have moved on. The 24 hr all inclusive is brilliant. Other hotels in the region will charge you extra for al e carte and cocktails this hotel does not. If you have a problem or you need some help the staff cannot do…

title: Brilliant all-inclusive that leaves you wanting for nothing.
review: This hotel is virtually perfect. From checking in to checking out we wanted for nothing. The whole place smells wonderful. Reception is massive and literally filled with comfy sofas & chairs. The rooms are modern and  spotless, in fact the entire place is spotless.  We had stayed for 7 days last year but went for 10 days this year and the standards had not slipped in the slightest. The food was the best we have had in an all-inclusive anywhere -loved the bread and butter pudding - a nice touch for us Brits !  It was also nice to end our days around the pool by having an ice cream, a pastry and a coffee in the patisserie before going back to our room. The staff are all very helpful and most speak good English. The animation team are very enthusiastic but don't push you into…

title: First Time staying
review: Dear Kaytee51,  thank you for the review. We are glad that your stay at Turquoise has met your expectations.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Lovely hotel - but be warned what to expect..!!
review: This was the first time staying in turkey and chose this hotel by the reviews and pictures. I can tell you that it lives up to everything. What a place the staff are so helpful and the entertainment varied through our stay. We loved the varied food. The rooms were clean as with the rest of the hotel. I would recomend it to anyone. Going back there again next year.

title: Amazing Holiday!
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a nice review!  Hope to see you next year!  Hotel Turquoise

title: Brilliant holiday
review: We stayed at this hotel, which was booked through Thompson Holidays, in September 2014. We have some small niggles and one large one, which some potential visitors might like to note:- - This is a predominantly German/Russian "establishment".  We did not have a problem with this, but note you are treated "differently".! - If you choose to sunbathe in the main pool area (and it has a lovely pool) you will be "bombarded" from about 10.00 am until 5.00 pm with heavy bass, popular music and PA announcements (in German mainly.!). The bass is relentless and permeates the entire area all the time.! - If you have a room overlooking the reception area and the hotel drive you will soon become aware that this is a busy hotel, with arrivals and departures at all of the 24 hours in a day.…

title: GR8TE
review: Just back from our 8th visit to the Turquoise and once again a perfect relaxing holiday.  I can wholeheartedly agree with comments from Hayley T that the outstanding service and friendliness of the staff make this hotel stand out from others. We have been to other hotels in the Side area, some of which would score more points than the Turquoise in some areas but all round the Turquoise ticks all boxes and the staff, all of them from the housekeeping and gardeners to the heads of department, make this hotel extra special.  Please when considering visiting the Turquoise take note of the majority of fantastic reviews and disregard the comments of a small minority who it feels as though they were at a different hotel. For one I have never once encountered any rudeness from any of…

title: Turkish Delight
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! See you then in May and August for 9th and 10th time, great!  Best regards  Hotel Turquoise

title: Great hotel
review: Visited the Hotel Turquoise from 9th - 16th September. We had never visited Turkey before but on driving up through the beautiful pine woods and gardens we knew we had made a good choice of hotel. We were warmly welcomed in reception with a glass of bubbly and a cool flannel and a small talk about the hotel. On arrival in our lovely sea view deluxe room we found a bucket of bubbly and gift for my husband's birthday. The room was spotless with tea and coffee facilities, robes and slippers and a safe. We enjoyed our bubbly on the balcony with a lovely view. Thank you guest relations.  Throughout our week we enjoyed everything at the Turquoise. The pools are amazing and warm and we always found sunbeds whatever time of day. All the staff are so warm and friendly everywhere. The…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Dear Pauline and Eddie,  thank you for your review. We are very happy that you enjoyed it so much. Thank you also for recommending Turquoise Hotel!  We hope to welcome you next year.  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Brilliant Hotel
review: If you have ever been to a Centre Parc then you will understand when I say entering the grounds of this hotel is like entering a wooded surprise, not quite what you expect, but wow!. The smell of the pine trees is awesome. I never wanted to visit Turkey and was persuaded to go by my family, how glad I am that we went and this hotel is  great ! No wonder it gets such consistently high levels of positive feedback.  The hotel is set in hundreds of fantastic trees, each one protected and numbered, and grounds are lovely and well kept.  You can walk along the beach to Side and takes about 35 minutes. The hotel also sits right on the beach front. What else makes this hotel great,  it has to be the staff, all of them make sure you are well looked after. The food is endless and  no…

title: my second home
review: Please do not believe any of the bad reviews on this hotel, I have stayed here seven times and I have yet to find anything negative to say.   The friendliness of the staff at the turquoise is amazing, they are all so nice.  The food in all of the restaurants is top quality. The rooms are spacious and immaculate, the pools and grounds are beautiful, the entertainment is great.  We are actually at the hotel now, and I can honestly say, we love it here. And we see a lot of people, who return year after year, one lovely family have been here 14 times!..   How anybody can find fault with it is beyond me, So please, don't let the odd bad review put you off, come to the turquoise and find out for yourself, you will be glad you did.

title: Lovely
review: Dear Lorraine,  thank you for your review. Hope to see you next year for the 8th time!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Fantastic family holiday for all ages
review: Stayed here with my husband end of July 2014 for one week.  Travelled from the airport late evening.  The driver didn't speak other than garbling the names of hotels as you arrived.  When we arrived he opened the luggage hold pointed to the cases, said 'self service' and looked disgusted that no-one offered a tip!   The hotel reception is spacious and very clean.  We were greeted warmly with a drink and cold fannels before being given instructions regarding the facilities and room cards - exceptional service.    Our room was in one of the small villas.  It was clean, if a little small, and could have done with a refurb, but adequate.  We freshened up and as instructed went to the restaurant for a bite to eat.  There was very little on offer other than cold meat, cheese and bread…

title: Outstanding
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for such a long and positive review! Hope to see you next year at Turquoise Hotel!  Best regards Hotel Turquoise

title: Great holiday, average hotel.
review: Have never written a review before but as we keep telling family and friends what a fantastic holiday we've had it feels only right to share.  We traveled on the 29th August and stayed 7 nights here. We were a party of 6, all one family ranging in age from 5 to 64 with a couple of 20 something's in between. We had a relaxing, enjoyable week, food was excellent, staff helpful, entertainment team worked their socks off but left you to relax in peace if you so wished. Our only regret is we didn't book for 2 weeks.
